# è¿è¡Œå‘å¸ƒ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83)

## è¿è¡Œ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C)

- `h5 å¹³å°`ï¼š `pnpm dev:h5`ï¼ˆ æˆ–è€…ç®€å•ç‚¹ `pnpm dev` ï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åæµè§ˆå™¨æ‰“å¼€ `http://localhost:9000/`ã€‚

- `wx å°ç¨‹åº`ï¼š `pnpm dev:mp-weixin`ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰“å¼€å¾®ä¿¡å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¯¼å…¥æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æœ¬é¡¹ç›®çš„ `dist/dev/mp-weixin` æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

- ![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-1.C8NDrjBL.png)

- `APP å¹³å°`ï¼š `pnpm dev:app`ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰“å¼€ `HBuilderX`ï¼Œå¯¼å…¥åˆšåˆšç”Ÿæˆçš„ `dist/dev/app` æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©è¿è¡Œåˆ° `æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå™¨`( `å¼€å‘æ—¶ä¼˜å…ˆä½¿ç”¨` )ï¼Œæˆ–è€… `è¿è¡Œåˆ°å®‰å“/ios åŸºåº§` (çœŸæœºè°ƒè¯•æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨) ã€‚

> è¿™æ ·æ“ä½œçš„è¯ï¼Œå¼€å‘æ—¶éƒ½ä¼šæœ‰çƒ­æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå¼€å‘ä½“éªŒå¾ˆçˆ½ï¼

## å‘å¸ƒ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83)

- `h5 å¹³å°`ï¼š `pnpm build:h5`ï¼Œæ‰“åŒ…åçš„æ–‡ä»¶åœ¨ `dist/build/h5`ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¾åˆ° web æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¦‚ nginx è¿è¡Œã€‚å¦‚æœæœ€ç»ˆä¸æ˜¯æ”¾åœ¨æ ¹ç›®å½•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ `manifest.config.ts` æ–‡ä»¶çš„ `h5.router.base` å±æ€§è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹ã€‚
- `wx å°ç¨‹åº`ï¼š `pnpm build:mp-weixin`ï¼Œæ‰“åŒ…åçš„æ–‡ä»¶åœ¨ `dist/build/mp-weixin`ï¼Œç„¶åé€šè¿‡å¾®ä¿¡å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·å¯¼å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶ç‚¹å‡»å³ä¸Šè§’çš„â€œä¸Šä¼ â€æŒ‰é’®è¿›è¡Œä¸Šä¼ ã€‚
- `APP å¹³å°`ï¼š `pnpm build:app`ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰“å¼€ `HBuilderX`ï¼Œå¯¼å…¥åˆšåˆšç”Ÿæˆçš„ `dist/build/app` æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œé€‰æ‹© `å‘è¡Œ` \- `åŸç”ŸAPP-äº‘æ‰“åŒ…`ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-13.GoNQNSo0.png)![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-5.DLGPBHAM.png)![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-6.D7SlvIcG.png)

> ç†Ÿæ‚‰åŸç”Ÿ APP å¼€å‘çš„å¼€å‘è€…ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `åŸç”ŸAPP-æœ¬åœ°æ‰“åŒ…`ã€‚

## APP æ‰“åŒ…æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ï¼ˆä¸Šï¼‰ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#app-%E6%89%93%E5%8C%85%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BA%8B%E9%A1%B9-%E4%B8%8A)

å¾ˆå¤šå¼€å‘è€…å‘ç°æ‰“åŒ…å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ‰“åŒ…ç™½å±ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œç®€å•è¯´æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

1. é‡æ–°è·å–è‡ªå·±çš„ `AppId`

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-7.AsGn1B1-.png)

2. æ ¹æ®ä¸Šé¢è·å–åˆ°çš„ `AppId` ä¿®æ”¹ `env/.env` æ–‡ä»¶çš„ `VITE_UNI_APPID` å­—æ®µ

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-8.CIdn65CR.png)

3. ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰äº‘æ‰“åŒ…å¦‚æœæœ‰å‡ºç°è§£ææ—¶å‡ºé—®é¢˜çš„ï¼ŒæŠŠ `minSdkVersion` ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¹ä½ä¸€ç‚¹å°±å¥½äº†ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ `21`ã€‚ï¼ˆæœ€ä½ `21`ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½äº `21`ï¼›æˆ‘æ¨¡æ¿é‡Œé¢è®¾ç½®çš„æ˜¯ `30`ï¼‰ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-9.AexLfCHq.png)

## APP æ‰“åŒ…æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ ï¼ˆä¸‹ï¼‰ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#app-%E6%89%93%E5%8C%85%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BA%8B%E9%A1%B9-%E4%B8%8B)

### `uni-app SDK` ç‰ˆæœ¬ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#uni-app-sdk-%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC)

> ç‰¹åˆ«å¤‡æ³¨ï¼š `2024-05-03`ï¼Œæ–°çš„ `base` æ¨¡æ¿çš„ `uni-app SDK` ç‰ˆæœ¬å·²ç»å‡çº§åˆ° `4.14` äº†ã€‚
>
> ![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-100.S7zWX1wz.png)

`2024-04-14`ï¼Œæ–°çš„ `base` æ¨¡æ¿çš„ `uni-app SDK` ç‰ˆæœ¬å·²ç»å‡çº§åˆ° `4.08` ï¼Œè®°å¾—æ›´æ–°æ‚¨çš„ `HBuilderx` ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚

`"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-4000820240401001"` è¡¨ç¤º `uni-app` ä¸º `3.0.0` ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¯¹åº”çš„ `HBuilderx` ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸º `4.08`ï¼Œåé¢çš„ `20240401001` æ˜¯å‘å¸ƒæ—¥æœŸã€‚

> `40008` ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­— `4` è¡¨ç¤ºä¸»è¦ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œåé¢æ¯ `2` ä½æ•°ä¸ºä¸€ç»„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä»£è¡¨ `4.0.8`ã€‚
>
> ç±»ä¼¼çš„ï¼Œ `30812` ä»£è¡¨ `3.8.12` ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œ `30909` ä»£è¡¨ `3.9.9` ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚
>
> å¦å¤–ï¼Œä» `3.99` å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåé¢ 2 ä¸ªå°ç‰ˆæœ¬åˆå¹¶ä¹¦å†™ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ `3.9.9` å˜æˆ `3.99`ï¼Œ `4.0.8` å˜æˆ `4.08`ã€‚

`unibest` å†å²ç”¨è¿‡çš„ `@dcloudio/uni-app` ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

text

```
"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-3081220230817001",  => 3.8.12
"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-3090920231225001",  => 3.99
"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-4000820240401001",  => 4.08
"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-4010420240430001",  => 4.14
```

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-10.BDMtgU3D.png)

### `uni-app SDK` ç‰ˆæœ¬åŒ¹é… `HBuilderX` [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#uni-app-sdk-%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E5%8C%B9%E9%85%8D-hbuilderx)

> æ¸©é¦¨æç¤ºï¼šä¸‹é¢çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ `uni-app` ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸º `3.8.12` æ—¶å†™çš„æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œé€‚å½“å‚è€ƒ~

æœ¬æ¨¡æ¿ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ `3.8.12` çš„åº“ç‰ˆæœ¬( `"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-3081220230817001",`)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°½é‡ä½¿ç”¨ `3.8.12` ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ `HBuilderX` æ¥æ‰“åŒ…ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å¯èƒ½æœ‰æœªçŸ¥çš„é£é™©ï¼Œå‡ºç°æƒ…å†µå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ã€‚

> åŸæ¥çš„å›¾ä¸è§äº†ï¼Œé‡æ–°è¡¥äº†ä¸€å¼ ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-11.v5s-2o-3.png)

ä¸Šå›¾è¡¨ç¤ºæ‚¨çš„ `HBuilderX` ç‰ˆæœ¬æ˜¯ `4.08`ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä»£ç  `uni-app SDK` (å³ `"@dcloudio/uni-app": "3.0.0-4010420240430001"` ) æ˜¯ `4.14`ï¼Œç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸åŒ¹é…ã€‚

- ç‚¹å‡» `ignore`ï¼ˆå¿½ç•¥ï¼‰ åè‹¥å¯ä»¥æ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé‚£å°±ä¸ç”¨ç®¡ã€‚ï¼ˆå¯é€‰æ·»åŠ å¦‚ä¸‹é…ç½®ï¼‰

json

```
"app-plus" : { "compatible": { "ignoreVersion": true } }
```

- å¦‚æœå‡ºç°ç™½å±å•¥çš„ï¼Œè¯·æ›´æ–°æ‚¨çš„ `HBuilderX` åˆ° `uni-app SDK` ç›¸åŒç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ `4.14` ï¼‰ã€‚

### å¤šä¸ª `HBuilderX` ç‰ˆæœ¬å®‰è£… [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%AA-hbuilderx-%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85)

> æ¸©é¦¨æç¤ºï¼šä¸‹é¢çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ `uni-app` ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸º `3.8.12` æ—¶å†™çš„æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œé€‚å½“å‚è€ƒ~

`MAC` å¯ä»¥å®‰è£…å¤šä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬çš„è½¯ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æˆ‘å®‰è£…äº† `3.8.12` (3.8.12.20230817) å’Œæœ€æ–°çš„ `3.99` (3.99.2023122611) ä¸¤ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¹³æ—¶çš„é¡¹ç›®ä½¿ç”¨ `3.99`, æ‰“åŒ… `unibest` çš„æ—¶å€™ä½¿ç”¨ `3.8.12`ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/11-12.CWkwnHyx.png)

> `window` ç³»ç»Ÿä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶å®‰è£…å¤šä¸ª `HBuilderX` ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå®‰è£…æ—¶é€‰æ‹©å®‰è£…åˆ°ä¸åŒç›®å½•ä¸‹å³å¯ã€‚

## æ€»ç»“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build\#%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93)

æœ¬æ–‡æè¿°äº†å¤šç«¯çš„è¿è¡Œå’Œå‘å¸ƒï¼Œå¸Œæœ›å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ã€‚

## Uni Plugins Overview
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin#VPContent)

On this page

# uni æ’ä»¶ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#uni-%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6)

## å¼•è¨€ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#%E5%BC%95%E8%A8%80)

æœ‰ç¾¤å‹ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡çœ‹åˆ° `unibest` é‡Œé¢ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶ `route-block` è¿™ç§å†™æ³•ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå¾ˆå¥‡æ€ªï¼Œä»æ¥æ²¡è§è¿‡ï¼

vue

```
<route lang="json5">
{
  layout: 'demo',
  style: {
    navigationBarTitleText: 'æ ‡é¢˜',
  },
}
</route>

<template>
  <view class="text-green-500">è²é¸½ï¼Œä½ å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘å–œæ¬¢ä½ ï¼</view>
</template>
```

## uni æ’ä»¶æ€»è§ˆ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#uni-%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6%E6%80%BB%E8%A7%88)

å“ˆå“ˆï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå½“ç„¶æ˜¯ `uniæ’ä»¶` çš„åŠŸåŠ³äº†ï¼Œå…·ä½“ç‚¹æ˜¯ `@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages` æ’ä»¶çš„åŠŸåŠ³ï¼Œè¯¥æ’ä»¶ç”± `uni-helper` å®˜æ–¹å›¢é˜Ÿå¼€å‘ã€‚

æœ¬æ–‡å°±æ¥è¯´è¯´ `unibest` éƒ½å¼•å…¥äº†å“ªäº›æœ‰ç”¨çš„ `uniæ’ä»¶`ã€‚ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ªè¡¨æ ¼æè¿°äº†å„ä¸ªæ’ä»¶çš„ä¸»è¦ä½œç”¨ã€‚

| æ’ä»¶å | ä½œç”¨ |
| --- | --- |
| @dcloudio/vite-plugin-uni | **æœ€æ ¸å¿ƒçš„ `uni æ’ä»¶`**ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å®ƒå°±ä¸èƒ½åœ¨ vite é¡¹ç›®è·‘ uniappï¼Œå…¶ä»–æ‰€æœ‰çš„ `uniæ’ä»¶` éƒ½éœ€è¦ç»é€šè¿‡å®ƒçš„æ‰‹æ¥ç¼–è¯‘ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å†™æ³•ä¸Šï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯å…ˆå†™ `UniXXX`ï¼Œå†å†™ `Uni`ï¼Œè§ä¸‹æ–‡ |
| @uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages | `uni æ’ä»¶`ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ `unibest çµé­‚æ’ä»¶`ï¼Œ `route-block` å°±æ˜¯å®ƒçš„åŠŸåŠ³ï¼Œè®©ä½ å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶å°±èƒ½è®¾ç½®é¡µé¢çš„è·¯å…ƒä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ— éœ€è·‘å» `pages.json` é…ç½®ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒ `pages.config.ts` ç¼–å†™ `pages.json` |
| @uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-layouts | `uni æ’ä»¶`ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§ `layouts` å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œç¾¤å‹è„‘æ´å¤§å¼€ï¼Œå……åˆ†åˆ©ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªç‰¹æ€§å®ç°å¹³æ—¶ä¸å®¹æ˜“å®ç°çš„å¸ƒå±€ |
| @uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest | `uni æ’ä»¶`ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ `manifest.config.ts` ç¼–å†™ `manifest.json` |

`UniXXX()` æ’ä»¶éƒ½éœ€è¦åœ¨ `uni()` ä¹‹å‰å¼•å…¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæœ€ç»ˆéƒ½éœ€è¦ `Uni` æ¥å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰çš„ä»£ç ã€‚å¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼š ![vite uni plugin](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/3-1.Cd6FstN8.png)

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹ `uni æ’ä»¶`ï¼Œå…¶ä»– `é€šç”¨æ’ä»¶` å¤§å®¶éƒ½æ¯”è¾ƒç†Ÿæ‚‰ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

`unibest` å¼•å…¥äº† `uni-helper` å›¢é˜Ÿçš„å‡ ä¸ªé‡è¦æ’ä»¶ï¼Œå°‘äº†å®ƒä»¬ `unibest` å°±ç¼ºå°‘äº†çµé­‚ï¼Œæ„Ÿè°¢ `uni-helper` å›¢é˜Ÿçš„è´¡çŒ®ã€‚ `Uni æ’ä»¶` åˆ—è¡¨å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

- `vite-plugin-uni-pages`

  - ä»‹ç»ï¼šä¸º `Vite` ä¸‹çš„ `uni-app` æä¾›åŸºäºæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿçš„è·¯ç”±
  - é¢å¤–ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ `TypeScript` æ¥ç¼–å†™ `uni-app` çš„ `pages.json`
  - è®¿é—®åœ°å€ï¼š [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages)
- `vite-plugin-uni-layouts`

  - ä»‹ç»ï¼šä¸º `Vite` ä¸‹çš„ `uni-app` æä¾›ç±» `nuxt` çš„ `layouts` ç³»ç»Ÿ
  - è®¿é—®åœ°å€ï¼š [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-layouts](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-layouts)
- `vite-plugin-uni-manifest`

  - ä»‹ç»ï¼šä½¿ç”¨ `TypeScript` æ¥ç¼–å†™ `uni-app` çš„ `manifest.json`
  - è®¿é—®åœ°å€ï¼š [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest)

## vite-plugin-uni-pages [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#vite-plugin-uni-pages)

å¾—ç›Šäº [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages)ï¼Œçº¦å®šå¼è·¯ç”±ï¼ˆæ–‡ä»¶è·¯ç”±ï¼‰çš„å®ç°è½»è€Œæ˜“ä¸¾ã€‚

`src/pages` ç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ¯ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶éƒ½ä»£è¡¨ç€ä¸€ä¸ªè·¯ç”±ã€‚è¦åˆ›å»ºæ–°é¡µé¢ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç›®å½•é‡Œæ–°å¢ `.vue` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ’ä»¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹åº”çš„ `pages.json` æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

`route` ä»£ç å—åˆ™å¯ä»¥é…ç½®é¡µé¢ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¿™äº›ä¿¡æ¯ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŒæ­¥åˆ° `page.json`ï¼Œæ— éœ€åˆ‡æ¢åˆ° `page.json` è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®ã€‚

> `pages.json` æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆçš„ï¼Œè¯·ä¸è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œå…¨å±€çš„ä¸œè¥¿è¯·åœ¨ `pages.config.ts` é‡Œé¢é…ç½®ï¼Œé¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„ä¸œè¥¿è¯·åœ¨ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶çš„ `route` ä»£ç å—é…ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ã€‚

vue

```
<!-- ä½¿ç”¨ type="home" å±æ€§è®¾ç½®é¦–é¡µï¼Œå…¶ä»–é¡µé¢ä¸éœ€è¦è®¾ç½®ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸ºpage -->
<!-- æ¨èä½¿ç”¨json5ï¼Œæ›´å¼ºå¤§ï¼Œä¸”å…è®¸æ³¨é‡Š -->
<route lang="json5" type="home">
{
  style: {
    navigationStyle: 'custom',
    navigationBarTitleText: 'é¦–é¡µ',
  },
}
</route>
<template>
  <div>
    <h1>æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ unibest</h1>
    <h4>unibest æ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ uniapp å¼€å‘æ¨¡æ¿</h4>
  </div>
</template>
```

vue

```
<route lang="json5">
{
  style: {
    navigationBarTitleText: 'å…³äº',
  },
}
</route>
<template>
  <view>
    <view>é€šè¿‡ `/pages/about` æ¥è®¿é—®è¿™ä¸ªé¡µé¢</view>
  </view>
</template>
```

### è®¾ç½®é¦–é¡µ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E9%A6%96%E9%A1%B5)

é€šè¿‡åœ¨ `route-block` é‡Œé¢é…ç½® `type="home"` å³å¯ï¼Œå°½é‡ä¿è¯ä¸€ä¸ªé¡¹ç›® `åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª` è¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å¤šä¸ªï¼Œä¼šæŒ‰ç…§å­—æ¯é¡ºåºæ¥æ’åˆ—ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆå¯èƒ½ä¸æ˜¯æ‚¨æƒ³è¦çš„æ•ˆæœã€‚

### è®¾ç½® pages è¿‡æ»¤å’Œåˆ†åŒ… [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE-pages-%E8%BF%87%E6%BB%A4%E5%92%8C%E5%88%86%E5%8C%85)

- è¿‡æ»¤ï¼šé»˜è®¤ `src/pages` é‡Œé¢çš„ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶éƒ½ä¼šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸éœ€è¦ç”Ÿæˆé¡µé¢å¯ä»¥å¯¹ `vite.config.ts` ä¸­çš„ `UniPages` è¿›è¡Œ `exclude` é…ç½®ã€‚

- åˆ†åŒ…ï¼šå¦‚æœéœ€è¦è®¾ç½® `åˆ†åŒ…` åˆ™å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ `subPackages` è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®ï¼Œè¯¥é…ç½®é¡¹æ˜¯ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é…ç½®å¤šä¸ª `åˆ†åŒ…`ï¼Œæ³¨æ„åˆ†åŒ…çš„ç›®å½•ä¸èƒ½ä¸º `src/pages` é‡Œé¢çš„å­ç›®å½•ã€‚


ts

```
UniPages({
  exclude: ['**/components/**/**.*'],
  subPackages: ['src/pages-sub'], // æ˜¯ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é…ç½®å¤šä¸ªï¼Œä½†ä¸èƒ½ä¸º `src/pages` é‡Œé¢çš„å­ç›®å½•
})
```

## vite-plugin-uni-layouts [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#vite-plugin-uni-layouts)

å¾—ç›Šäº [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-layouts](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-layouts)ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥è½»æ¾åœ°åˆ‡æ¢ä¸åŒçš„å¸ƒå±€ã€‚

`src/layouts` æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹çš„ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶éƒ½ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªå¸ƒå±€ï¼Œé»˜è®¤çš„å¸ƒå±€æ–‡ä»¶åä¸º `default` ï¼Œè·¯å¾„ `src/layouts/default.vue` ã€‚

å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ä¿®æ”¹ä½¿ç”¨çš„å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶å†… `route` ä»£ç å—æŒ‡å®šéœ€è¦çš„å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ç¤ºä¾‹ä½¿ç”¨ `demo` å¸ƒå±€ã€‚

vue

```
<route lang="json5">
{
  layout: 'demo',
  style: {
    navigationBarTitleText: 'å…³äº',
  },
}
</route>
```

vue

```
<template>
  <view>
    <!-- è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥å†™é€šç”¨çš„å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å¯¼èˆªæ ï¼Œtabbarç­‰ -->
    <!-- sloté‡Œé¢è£…çš„å°±æ˜¯å­é¡µé¢çš„å†…å®¹ -->
    <slot />
  </view>
</template>
```

## vite-plugin-uni-manifest [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#vite-plugin-uni-manifest)

å¾—ç›Šäº [@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest](https://github.com/uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest)ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `TypeScript` æ¥ç¼–å†™ `manifest.json`ã€‚

> `manifest.json` æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆçš„ï¼Œè¯·ä¸è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œéœ€è¦é…ç½®çš„å†…å®¹è¯·åœ¨ `manifest.config.ts` é‡Œé¢é…ç½®ã€‚

## æ€»ç»“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/3-plugin\#%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93)

æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç»äº† `unibest` å¼•å…¥çš„å‡ ä¸ªé‡è¦çš„ `uniæ’ä»¶`ã€‚

å¦‚æœè¿˜æƒ³äº†è§£æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å» `uni-helper` [github ä»“åº“](https://github.com/uni-helper) çœ‹çœ‹ã€‚

## Local SVG Icon Usage
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg#VPContent)

On this page

# SVG ç¯‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#svg-%E7%AF%87)

ä¸Šä¸€ç« ã€Šäº”ã€å›¾æ ‡ç¯‡ã€‹ä¸»è¦ä»‹ç»äº† `çº¿ä¸Šå›¾æ ‡` çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä»Šå¤©å¸¦ç»™å¤§å®¶æœ¬åœ° `SVG` å›¾æ ‡çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

æœ¬åœ° `SVG` å›¾æ ‡ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ä¸»è¦æœ‰ï¼š

- `image + src` æ–¹å¼

  - `staticç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡
  - `ç›¸å¯¹ç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡
  - `çº¿ä¸Šåœ°å€` å›¾æ ‡

> **`å›¾ç‰‡`** ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šé¢å‡ ç§æ–¹å¼ã€‚

## `image + src` æ–¹å¼ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#image-src-%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F)

æ ¹æ®å›¾ç‰‡åœ°å€ä¸åŒï¼Œåˆ†ä¸º 2 ç§ï¼š `staticç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡ ï¼Œ `ç›¸å¯¹ç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡ã€‚

### 1\. `staticç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#_1-static%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95-%E5%9B%BE%E6%A0%87)

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ç›´æ¥ç¼–å†™ä»£ç å³å¯ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

html

```
<image src="/static/svg/demo.svg" mode="scaleToFill" class="h-20 w-20" />
```

### 2\. `ç›¸å¯¹ç›®å½•` å›¾æ ‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#_2-%E7%9B%B8%E5%AF%B9%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95-%E5%9B%BE%E6%A0%87)

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼éœ€è¦å…ˆå¼•å…¥ï¼Œå†ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä»£ç ç¼–å†™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

html

```
<template>
  <image :src="iconUrl" mode="scaleToFill" class="h-20 w-20" />
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
  import iconUrl from './demo.svg'
</script>
```

### 3\. `çº¿ä¸Šåœ°å€` å›¾æ ‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#_3-%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80-%E5%9B%BE%E6%A0%87)

è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä»£ç ç¼–å†™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

html

```
<template>
  <image src="https://xxx.com/demo.svg" mode="scaleToFill" class="h-20 w-20" />
</template>
```

## å…¶ä»– [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96)

> `SvgComponent` æ–¹å¼ å’Œ `SvgIcon` æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä»… `H5ç«¯` é€‚ç”¨ï¼Œæ„Ÿå…´è¶£çš„å¯ä»¥é˜…è¯»ä¸‹

Details

### `SvgComponent` æ–¹å¼ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#svgcomponent-%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F)

ä» `Webç«¯` è¿‡æ¥çš„åŒå­¦éƒ½çŸ¥é“ `SvgComponent` è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦å¼•å…¥ `vite-svg-loader` æ’ä»¶å³å¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ `3ç§` æ–¹å¼å¼•å…¥ `svg`: `url`, `raw`, `component`ã€‚

- URL

SVGs can be imported as URLs using the `?url` suffix:

js

```
import iconUrl from './my-icon.svg?url'
// 'data:image/svg+xml...'
```

Used in template:

html

```
<template>
  <image :src="iconUrl" mode="scaleToFill" class="h-20 w-20" />
</template>
```

- Raw

SVGs can be imported as strings using the `?raw` suffix:

js

```
import iconRaw from './my-icon.svg?raw'
// '<?xml version="1.0"?>...'
```

Used in template:

html

```
<template>{{ iconRaw }}</template>
```

- Component

SVGs can be explicitly imported as Vue components using the `?component` suffix:

js

```
import IconComponent from './my-icon.svg?component'
// <IconComponent />
```

Used in template:

html

```
<template>
  <IconComponent />
</template>
```

ä½†æ˜¯ç›®å‰ç»è¿‡æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œåªæœ‰ `url` çš„æ–¹å¼æ‰€æœ‰ç«¯å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä¸ä¸Šé¢çš„ `image + src - ç›¸å¯¹ç›®å½• å›¾æ ‡` æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•ˆæœã€‚è‡³äº `component` åªæœ‰ `H5ç«¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆ`ï¼Œå…¶ä»–ç«¯ä¸è¡Œã€‚

### `SvgIcon` æ–¹å¼ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#svgicon-%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F)

ä» `Webç«¯` è¿‡æ¥çš„åŒå­¦éƒ½çŸ¥é“ `SvgIcon` è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦å¼•å…¥ `vite-plugin-svg-icons` æ’ä»¶ \+ `vite é…ç½®`ï¼Œå†ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªé€šç”¨çš„ `SvgIcon` å³å¯ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åŒæ ·åªæœ‰ `H5ç«¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆ`ï¼Œå…¶ä»–ç«¯ä¸è¡Œã€‚

`vite` é…ç½®å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

```
createSvgIconsPlugin({
  // æŒ‡å®šè¦ç¼“å­˜çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
  iconDirs: [path.resolve(process.cwd(), 'src/assets')],
  // æŒ‡å®šsymbolIdæ ¼å¼
  symbolId: 'icon-[dir]-[name]',
}),
```

å¦‚ä¸Šï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æŠŠ `svg` æ”¾åˆ° `src/assets` ç›®å½•å³å¯ã€‚

`SvgIcon` ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

html

```
<template>
  <svg aria-hidden="true">
    <use :href="symbolId" :fill="color" />
  </svg>
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup name="SvgIcon">
  const props = withDefaults(
    defineProps<{
      prefix?: string
      name: string
      color?: string
    }>(),
    {
      prefix: 'icon',
      name: '',
      color: '#333',
    },
  )
  const symbolId = computed(() => `#${props.prefix}-${props.name}`)
</script>
```

ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

html

```
<!-- src/assets/demo.svg -->
<SvgIcon name="demo" class="h-20 w-20"></SvgIcon>

<!-- src/assets/dir/demo.svg -->
<SvgIcon name="dir-demo" class="h-20 w-20"></SvgIcon>
```

> `SvgComponent` ä¾èµ– `vite-svg-loader` æ’ä»¶
>
> `SvgIcon` ä¾èµ– `vite-plugin-svg-icons` æ’ä»¶

## æ€»ç»“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/6-svg\#%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93)

æœ¬åœ° `svg` çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦å…¨ç«¯é€‚é…ï¼Œé‚£å°±åªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ `image + src` çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

> `SvgComponent` ä¾èµ– `vite-svg-loader` æ’ä»¶
>
> `SvgIcon` ä¾èµ– `vite-plugin-svg-icons` æ’ä»¶

å…¶ä»– 2 ç§æ–¹å¼ â€”â€” `SvgComponent` \+ `SvgIcon` ä»… `h5` ç«¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œå…¶ä»–ç«¯éƒ½ä¸èƒ½ç”¨ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œé‚£å°±åˆ äº†ï¼Œå¯¹åº”çš„ 2 ä¸ªæ’ä»¶ä¹Ÿä¸€èµ·åˆ äº†ï¼Œç›®å‰ `base` åˆ†æ”¯å·²ç»åˆ äº†ã€‚

å…¨æ–‡å®Œ~

## State Management Overview
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state#VPContent)

On this page

# çŠ¶æ€ç¯‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E7%8A%B6%E6%80%81%E7%AF%87)

æœ¬æ–‡ä¸»è¦ä»‹ç»äº†å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç† `pinia` å’Œ ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€ `ref` \+ `reactive`ã€‚

## pinia [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#pinia)

`unibest` å·²ç»å†…ç½®äº† `Pinia` \+ `pinia-plugin-persistedstate`(æ•°æ®æŒä¹…åŒ–æ’ä»¶)ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›äº†å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚

### å…¼å®¹æ€§å¤„ç† [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E5%85%BC%E5%AE%B9%E6%80%A7%E5%A4%84%E7%90%86)

æœ¬èº« `pinia-plugin-persistedstate` æ˜¯ä¸æ”¯æŒ `uniapp` çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ `pinia-plugin-persistedstate` æä¾›äº†ä¿®æ”¹ `storage` å­˜å‚¨ API çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤æ˜¯ `localStorage`ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª `WEB API`ï¼Œ `éH5ç«¯` ä¸æ”¯æŒï¼‰ï¼Œç›®å‰ `unibest` å·²ç»å¤„ç†å¥½äº†ã€‚å…³é”®ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ts

```
import { createPinia } from 'pinia'
import { createPersistedState } from 'pinia-plugin-persistedstate' // æ•°æ®æŒä¹…åŒ–

const store = createPinia()
store.use(
  createPersistedState({
    storage: {
      getItem: uni.getStorageSync, // çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ
      setItem: uni.setStorageSync, // çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ
    },
  }),
)
```

### å®šä¹‰ `pinia` å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89-pinia-%E5%85%A8%E5%B1%80%E7%8A%B6%E6%80%81)

`src/store/xxx.ts` é‡Œé¢ç¼–å†™ä»£ç ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/store/count.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

æ³¨æ„ `defineStore` ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æŒä¹…åŒ–ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸éœ€è¦ã€‚

ts

```
import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
import { ref } from 'vue'

export const useCountStore = defineStore(
  'count',
  () => {
    const count = ref(0)
    const increment = () => {
      count.value++
    }
    const decrement = () => {
      count.value--
    }
    const reset = () => {
      count.value = 0
    }
    return {
      count,
      decrement,
      increment,
      reset,
    }
  },
  {
    // å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æŒä¹…åŒ–å°±å†™ true, ä¸éœ€è¦æŒä¹…åŒ–å°±å†™ falseï¼ˆæˆ–è€…å»æ‰è¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®é¡¹ï¼‰
    persist: true,
  },
)
```

> è¯·ä¸è¦éšæ„æŠŠæ•°æ®ä¸¢åˆ° `pinia`ï¼Œèƒ½ä¸ç”¨å°±ä¸ç”¨ã€‚ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€å°½é‡ä½¿ç”¨ `ref` æˆ–è€… `reactive`ã€‚

### ä½¿ç”¨ `pinia` å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8-pinia-%E5%85%A8%E5%B1%80%E7%8A%B6%E6%80%81)

åœ¨ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨äº†ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/pages/demo.vue` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

vue

```
<template>
  <view class="flex justify-center items-center text-blue-500 mt-4 mb-4">
    <view class="w-20">Count: {{ countStore.count }}</view>
    <button class="ml-2 mr-2" @click="countStore.decrement">-1</button>
    <button class="ml-2 mr-2" @click="countStore.increment">+1</button>
    <button class="ml-2 mr-2" @click="countStore.reset">é‡ç½®</button>
  </view>
</template>

<script lang="ts" setup>
import { useCountStore } from '@/store'

const countStore = useCountStore()
</script>
```

## ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E7%AE%80%E5%8D%95%E7%8A%B6%E6%80%81)

ä½ å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ `Vue` æä¾›çš„ `ref` æˆ– `reactive` æ–¹æ³•æ¥åšç®€å•çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ã€‚

### ref [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#ref)

å¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/pages/demo/useCount.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

ts

```
// å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€
const globalCount = ref(1)
export function useCount() {
  // æœ¬åœ°çŠ¶æ€
  const localCount = ref(1)
  function increment() {
    globalCount.value++
    localCount.value++
  }
  return {
    globalCount,
    localCount,
    increment,
  }
}
```

å¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/pages/demo/index.vue`ï¼Œä¸ `ref` ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€æ–‡ä»¶æ”¾åˆ°åŒä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ç®¡ç†ã€‚

vue

```
<script setup lang="ts">
import useCount from './useCount.ts'
const { globalCount, localCount, increment } = useCount()
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="increment()">
    {{ globalCount }}
    {{ localCount }}
  </button>
</template>
```

## reactive [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#reactive)

`reactive` ä¸ `ref` ç±»ä¼¼ã€‚

å¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/pages/demo/count.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå®šä¹‰çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

ts

```
export const countStore = reactive({
  count: 0,
  increment() {
    this.count++
  },
})
```

å¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯ `src/pages/demo/index.vue`ï¼Œä¸ `reactive` ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€æ–‡ä»¶æ”¾åˆ°åŒä¸€ä¸ªç›®å½•ä¸‹ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ç®¡ç†ã€‚

vue

```
<script setup lang="ts">
import { countStore } from './count.ts'
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="countStore.increment()">
    {{ countStore.count }}
  </button>
</template>
```

## æ€»ç»“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/9-state\#%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93)

æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç»äº† `unibest` é‡Œé¢çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†çš„ `2` ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼š `pinia` å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ å’Œ `ref\reactive` ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ¼”ç¤ºäº†å¦‚ä½•å®šä¹‰çŠ¶æ€å’Œä½¿ç”¨çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

æ³¨æ„éœ€è¦çµæ´»ä½¿ç”¨ `pinia` å’Œ `ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€`ï¼Œå±€éƒ¨çš„çŠ¶æ€å°½é‡ä½¿ç”¨ `ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€` çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥å¤„ç†ï¼Œå‡å°‘ `pinia` é‡Œé¢å…¨å±€å˜é‡çš„æ•°é‡ã€‚

å…¨æ–‡å®Œ~

## Iconfont Library
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/other/iconfont/iconfont#VPContent)

On this page

## iconfont å›¾æ ‡åº“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/other/iconfont/iconfont\#iconfont-%E5%9B%BE%E6%A0%87%E5%BA%93)

`iconfont` åŒæ ·æœ‰æµ·é‡å…è´¹çš„å›¾æ ‡ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒä¸Šä¼ è‡ªå·±çš„å›¾æ ‡ã€‚å…¬å¸é¡¹ç›®é€šå¸¸ä¼šæœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„å›¾æ ‡ï¼Œç”±ä¸“ä¸šçš„ `UIè®¾è®¡å¸ˆ` è®¾è®¡ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶é€šå¸¸ä¼šä½¿ç”¨ `iconfont` æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨å›¾æ ‡ã€‚

1. æ‰“å¼€ `é˜¿é‡Œå·´å·´çŸ¢é‡å›¾æ ‡åº“ iconfont`ï¼Œåœ°å€ï¼š [https://www.iconfont.cn/ï¼Œå¹¶ç™»å½•ã€‚](https://www.iconfont.cn/%EF%BC%8C%E5%B9%B6%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95%E3%80%82)
2. å¯»æ‰¾éœ€è¦çš„å›¾æ ‡ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸Šä¼ è‡ªå·±çš„å›¾æ ‡ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-9.DZ2MSubu.png)

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-10.bJ29tv3u.png)

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-11.MsJ7W7FS.png)

> åˆæ¬¡æ¥è§¦ `iconfont` çš„åŒå­¦ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šæ‰¾ä¸åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼šèµ„æºç®¡ç† \-\- æˆ‘çš„é¡¹ç›®

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-12.C_hNJtqo.png)

- 3.å›¾æ ‡æ–¹å¼é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æœ‰ `Unicode` `Font class` `Symbol` ä¸‰ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«é¢„è§ˆå’Œä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-13.DDhOMza-.png)

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-14.DgbLFpei.png)

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-15.CrmqLrM6.png)

- `Unicode` çš„æ–¹å¼å¤ªè½åï¼Œè¯­ä¹‰åŒ–ä¸æ˜æ˜¾ï¼Œä¸æ¨èï¼›
- `Symbol` çš„æ–¹å¼å¤ªå…ˆè¿›ï¼ˆèƒŒååŸç†æ˜¯ç”Ÿæˆäº† `SVG` é›ªç¢§å›¾ï¼‰ï¼Œå…ˆè¿›åˆ° `å°ç¨‹åº` å’Œ `APP` éƒ½ä¸æ”¯æŒï¼Œåªèƒ½æ— å¥ˆæ”¾å¼ƒã€‚

> `Symbol` çš„æ–¹å¼ç”Ÿæˆ `svg` é›ªç¢§å›¾ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š
>
> ![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-16.DEYSBQG7.png)

- `Font class` åˆ™æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€åˆé€‚çš„é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œæœ‰ `Symbol` ä¸€æ ·çš„è¯­ä¹‰åŒ–ï¼ˆéƒ½æ˜¯ `icon-xxx` æ–¹å¼ï¼‰ï¼Œå¼•å…¥å’Œä½¿ç”¨ä¹Ÿæ–¹ä¾¿ï¼ˆ `Symbol` æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª `js` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œ `Font class` æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª `css` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰ã€‚

3. ç‚¹å‡»é€‰ä¸­ `Font class` åå†ç‚¹å‡» `æŸ¥çœ‹åœ¨çº¿è¿æ¥` æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ‹¿åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ª `css` çš„é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦‚ [//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font\_4032028\_mbcuy517h6.css](https://at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_4032028_mbcuy517h6.css) ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœŸé—´æ–°åŠ å…¥äº†å›¾æ ‡ï¼Œè®°å¾—ç‚¹å‡»æ›´æ–°é“¾æ¥ï¼Œä¼šé‡æ–°ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªé“¾æ¥ï¼Œåªæœ‰æœ€åé¢ä¸€ä¸² hash æœ‰æ”¹å˜ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ—§çš„é“¾æ¥ä¾ç„¶å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-14.DgbLFpei.png)

æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ `Font class` çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦è¿™ä¸€ä¸ª `css` é“¾æ¥å°±è¡Œï¼Œæ— éœ€ `ä¸‹è½½è‡³æœ¬åœ°`ï¼Œæƒ³è¦æœ¬åœ°é¢„è§ˆçš„è¯æ‰éœ€è¦ `ä¸‹è½½è‡³æœ¬åœ°`ã€‚

> `iconfont` æœ‰é»˜è®¤çš„å‰ç¼€ `icon-`ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå…¶ä»–çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æˆ‘çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®è®¾ç½®ä¸º `bap-icon-`ï¼Œä»¥é˜²è·Ÿå…¶ä»–çš„å†²çªã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-18.BzpASQPS.png)

> æ³¨æ„ `uniapp` é¡¹ç›®æ‹¿åˆ° `css` é“¾æ¥æ”¾åˆ° `index.html` æ˜¯ä¸å¯¹çš„ï¼Œè¿™æ ·åšåªåœ¨ `h5` ä¸­ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œ `å°ç¨‹åº` å’Œ `APP` éƒ½ä¸ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œæ­£ç¡®çš„åšæ³•æ˜¯æ”¾åˆ°ä»£ç é‡Œé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºå¼•å…¥ã€‚ä¸‹é¢ä¼šè®²ï¼š

- 4.åœ¨ `style/index.scss` ä¸­å†™ä¸Šä¸Šé¢çš„ `css` é“¾æ¥é‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹ï¼ˆ `style/index.scss` å·²ç»åœ¨ `main.ts` å¼•å…¥äº†ï¼Œ `unibest` æ¨¡æ¿å·²ç»å†…ç½®ï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹

> æ³¨æ„ï¼š `url(//at.alicdn.com)` é‡Œé¢çš„è·¯å¾„è¦æ”¹ä¸º `url(https://at.alicdn.com)`ï¼Œå› ä¸º APP é‡Œé¢ `//` æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶åè®®ã€‚ â€”â€” è®¾å®š `https` åè®®

css

```
@font-face {
  font-family: iconfont; /* Project id 4032028 */
  src:
    url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_4032028_mbcuy517h6.woff2?t=1713685013355') format('woff2'),
    url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_4032028_mbcuy517h6.woff?t=1713685013355') format('woff'),
    url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_4032028_mbcuy517h6.ttf?t=1713685013355') format('truetype');
}

.iconfont {
  font-family: iconfont !important;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-style: normal;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

.icon-facebook::before {
  content: '\e87d';
}

.icon-twitter::before {
  content: '\e646';
}

.icon-telegram::before {
  content: '\f245';
}
```

5. ç¼–å†™ä»£ç ï¼Œ `<i class="iconfont icon-facebook"></i>`

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-23.BMlt2kQm.png)

6. é¢„è§ˆï¼Œ `h5 ` ç«¯æ­£å¸¸ï¼ŒAPP ç«¯ä¸æ­£å¸¸ï¼Œå°ç¨‹åºç«¯çœ‹ç€æ­£å¸¸ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å°ä¹Ÿä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼š

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-22.Bf7o5Cqv.png)

7. è¿™ä¸ªæ€ä¹ˆå¤„ç†å‘¢ï¼Ÿè½¬æˆ `base64` æ˜¯æœ€å¿«æ·çš„ï¼Œ `iconfont` æœ¬èº«å°±æ”¯æŒï¼Œ `3` æ­¥æå®šï¼š

- 7.1 å¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼Œå‹¾é€‰ `Base64`

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-21.BL9bWHcY.png)

- 7.2 ç”Ÿæˆæ–°é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¹¶å¾—åˆ°æ–°çš„ `css` ä»£ç 


![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/5-20.amNKiK4p.png)

- 7.3 å¼•å…¥æ–°ä»£ç ï¼Œåˆ·æ–°ç•Œé¢ï¼Œå°ç¨‹åºä¸æŠ¥é”™äº†ï¼ŒAPP ä¹Ÿæ­£å¸¸äº†ï¼

> å…¨å¹³å°å…¼å®¹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸‹æ‹‰åˆ·æ–°ã€ä¸Šæ‹‰åŠ è½½æ›´å¤šï¼Œæ”¯æŒè™šæ‹Ÿåˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªåŠ¨ç®¡ç†ç©ºæ•°æ®å›¾ã€ç‚¹å‡»è¿”å›é¡¶éƒ¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒèŠå¤©åˆ†é¡µã€æœ¬åœ°åˆ†é¡µï¼Œæ”¯æŒå±•ç¤ºæœ€åæ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå›½é™…åŒ–ç­‰ç­‰ã€‚

> ç²¾è‡´çš„ä¸‹æ‹‰åˆ·æ–°å’Œä¸Šæ‹‰åŠ è½½ js æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¸€å¥—ä»£ç å¤šç«¯è¿è¡Œï¼Œæ”¯æŒ `uni-app`ã€‚

## Unibest Quick Start
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start#VPContent)

On this page

# å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B)

- å‰ç½®ä¾èµ–

  - **Node.js** \- `>=v18`
  - **pnpm** \- `>=7.30`ï¼ˆæ¨èä½¿ç”¨ `8.12+`ï¼‰
  - **`VSCode`** \- å¯é€‰ `WebStrom`
  - **`HBuilderX`** \- `APP` çš„è¿è¡Œå’Œå‘å¸ƒè¿˜æ˜¯ç¦»ä¸å¼€å®ƒ
  - **Vue-Office** \- `v2.1.10`

## åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›® [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BA%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE)

é€šè¿‡ä¸‹é¢çš„å‘½ä»¤å¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿç”Ÿæˆé¡¹ç›®æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œ `pnpm create unibest <é¡¹ç›®åç§°>` ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å†™ `<é¡¹ç›®åç§°>` ä¼šè¿›å…¥å‘½ä»¤è¡Œäº¤äº’æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

bash

```
# å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ pnpmï¼Œè¯·å…ˆå®‰è£…: npm i -g pnpm
pnpm create unibest my-project
```

npm åˆ›å»ºå¦‚ä¸‹(ä¸æ¨è)

Details

å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ `npm`ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æœ‰ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦åŠ ä¸Š `@latest` æ ‡è¯†ï¼Œå¦‚æœåˆ›å»ºå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ `pnpm` å®‰è£…ã€‚

bash

```
npm create unibest my-project
# å¦‚æœæç¤ºæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ç”Ÿæˆçš„é¡¹ç›®ç‰ˆæœ¬å¤ªæ—§ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‹é¢çš„å‘½ä»¤ï¼Œå¢åŠ  @latest æ ‡è¯†
npm create unibest@latest my-project
```

å®é™…æ“ä½œæˆªå›¾å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

![create project](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/2-1.UVknIGdF.png)

`create-unibest` åœ¨ `v1.10.0` å¼€å§‹ä¼šæœ‰ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/2-2.NoahZEd4.png)

![unibest templates](https://oss.laf.run/ukw0y1-site/xmind/unibest%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF.png)

`create unibest` æ”¯æŒ `-t` å‚æ•°é€‰æ‹©æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œç›®å‰å·²æœ‰ä¸¤å¤§ç±» `8` ä¸ªæ¨¡æ¿

- `æ™®é€š` æ¨¡æ¿( `4ä¸ª` ï¼‰ï¼šåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ `base`ã€ `tabbar`ã€ `i18n`ã€ `demo`ã€ ~~`js`~~
- `hbx` æ¨¡æ¿( `2ä¸ª` ï¼‰ï¼šåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ `hbx-base`ã€ `hbx-demo`ã€‚

ä¸å¸¦ `-t` å‚æ•°æ—¶ä¼šé»˜è®¤ç”Ÿæˆ `base` æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚

`base` æ¨¡æ¿æ˜¯æœ€åŸºæœ¬çš„æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œæ›´æ–°æœ€åŠæ—¶ï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨ `base` æ¨¡æ¿åˆ›å»ºæ–°é¡¹ç›®ã€‚å…¶ä»–å‡ ä¸ªæ¨¡æ¿ä¹Ÿæ˜¯åŸºäº `base` æ¨¡æ¿å¾—åˆ°çš„ã€‚ `demo` æ¨¡æ¿åˆ™ä½œä¸ºå‚è€ƒç”¨ã€‚

`js` æ¨¡æ¿ä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `base` æ¨¡æ¿æ›¿ä»£ï¼Œé‡Œé¢å·²ç»åšäº†å…¼å®¹é…ç½®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ç¼–å†™ `js`ï¼ŒåŸæœ¬çš„ `ts` æ–‡ä»¶è¿˜èƒ½æä¾›éƒ¨åˆ†ç±»å‹ï¼Œä½•ä¹è€Œä¸ä¸ºï¼Ÿ

sh

```
# VS Code æ¨¡æ¿
pnpm create unibest my-project # é»˜è®¤ç”¨ base æ¨¡æ¿

pnpm create unibest my-project -t base # åŸºç¡€æ¨¡æ¿
pnpm create unibest my-project -t tabbar # è‡ªå®šä¹‰ tabbar æ¨¡æ¿
pnpm create unibest my-project -t i18n # å¤šè¯­è¨€æ¨¡æ¿
pnpm create unibest my-project -t demo # æ‰€æœ‰demoçš„æ¨¡æ¿(åŒ…æ‹¬i18n)
# pnpm create unibest my-project -t js # js æ¨¡æ¿

# HBuilderX æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ä½¿ç”¨ uniCloud äº‘å¼€å‘ (æœªæ¥å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ¥ uni-app x)
pnpm create unibest my-project -t hbx-base # hbxçš„baseæ¨¡æ¿
pnpm create unibest my-project -t hbx-demo # hbxçš„demoæ¨¡æ¿ï¼ŒåŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰çš„demo
```

> 2024-12-29<å‘¨æ—¥> å‘è¡¨äº†ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ï¼š [ã€unibestã€‘å¯ä»¥å»æ‰hbxæ¨¡ç‰ˆäº†ï¼Œbaseæ¨¡æ¿ä¸€ç»Ÿå¤©ä¸‹](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ybunFNkjKfV5yVLOMvqscg?token=1696234630&lang=zh_CN)
>
> å°±æ˜¯è¯´ hbx æ¨¡æ¿å¯ä»¥é€€å‡ºå†å²èˆå°äº†ã€‚

## é¡¹ç›®ä»“åº“åœ°å€ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E4%BB%93%E5%BA%93%E5%9C%B0%E5%9D%80)

`github` å’Œ `gitee` å®æ—¶åŒæ­¥ï¼Œä»£ç ä¸€è‡´ã€‚

### æ™®é€šæ¨¡æ¿ï¼š [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E6%99%AE%E9%80%9A%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF)

- [https://github.com/feige996/unibest](https://github.com/feige996/unibest)
- [https://gitee.com/feige996/unibest](https://gitee.com/feige996/unibest)

> `demo` æ¨¡æ¿æ˜¯åœ¨ `hello-unibest` é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ï¼Œä»“åº“åœ°å€å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

- [https://github.com/feige996/hello-unibest](https://github.com/feige996/hello-unibest)
- [https://gitee.com/feige996/hello-unibest](https://gitee.com/feige996/hello-unibest)

### hbx æ¨¡æ¿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#hbx-%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF)

- [https://github.com/uni-run/unibest-hbx](https://github.com/uni-run/unibest-hbx)

> `hbx` ç›®å‰ç”± `é’è°·` å¤§ä½¬ç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œå¾®ä¿¡å·ï¼š `qingguxixi`ï¼Œ [é’è°· github åœ°å€](https://github.com/Xiphin) ã€‚

## å®‰è£…ã€è¿è¡Œ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85%E3%80%81%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C)

bash

```
pnpm i
pnpm dev
# devé»˜è®¤è¿è¡Œçš„æ˜¯h5ï¼Œå…¶ä»–å¹³å°æ‰§è¡Œdev:<uni-platform>ï¼Œå¦‚:
pnpm dev:mp-weixin
```

`pnpm dev` ä¹‹ååœ¨æµè§ˆå™¨æ‰“å¼€ `http://localhost:9000/`ã€‚

> å…¶ä»–å¹³å°æ„å»ºå’Œå‘å¸ƒï¼ŒæŸ¥çœ‹ [è¿è¡Œå‘å¸ƒç¯‡](https://www.unibest.tech/base/11-build)ã€‚

## ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ `commit` [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1-commit)

bash

```
git add .
git commit -m "feat: init project"
```

## `v3` ä»£ç å— [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#v3-%E4%BB%A3%E7%A0%81%E5%9D%97)

åœ¨ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œè¾“å…¥ `v3` æŒ‰ `tab` å³å¯å¿«é€Ÿç”Ÿæˆé¡µé¢æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¤§å¤§åŠ å¿«é¡µé¢ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

> åŸç†ï¼šåŸºäº `VSCode` ä»£ç å—ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/2-4.op0lUZTT.gif)

## æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/2-start\#%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BA%8B%E9%A1%B9)

- è‹¥ä»£ç é‡Œé¢è‡ªåŠ¨å¼•å…¥çš„ `API` æŠ¥é”™ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦ `pnpm dev` å³å¯ã€‚
- è‹¥ä»£ç è¿è¡Œåï¼Œ `H5ç«¯` æµè§ˆå™¨ç•Œé¢åº•éƒ¨æ²¡æœ‰ `tabbar`ï¼Œ åˆ·æ–°æµè§ˆå™¨æˆ–è€…å†æ¬¡ `pnpm dev` å³å¯ã€‚

## UnoCSS Usage Guide
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style#VPContent)

On this page

# æ ·å¼ç¯‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#%E6%A0%B7%E5%BC%8F%E7%AF%87)

æœ¬ç¯‡ä¸»è¦ä»‹ç» `UnoCSS` çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥åŠå¦‚ä½•ä¸ `è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å°ºå¯¸` å¯¹åº”ã€‚

## UnoCSS [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#unocss)

[UnoCSS](https://unocss.dev/) æ˜¯æŒ‰éœ€ä½¿ç”¨çš„åŸå­ CSS å¼•æ“ï¼Œæä¾›äº†è‰¯å¥½çš„æ ·å¼æ”¯æŒã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/4-1.DCw-2tV6.png)

åœ¨ VSCode ä¸­è¿˜å¯ä»¥é¢„è§ˆï¼Œ

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/4-2.C8yzf1Vb.png)

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/4-3.v7fdjSDS.png)

> å¦‚æœåŸå­åŒ– `UnoCSS` æ²¡æœ‰é¢„è§ˆæ•ˆæœï¼Œè¯·å®‰è£… `VSCode` æ’ä»¶ `antfu.unocss`ã€‚

å¦‚æœä¸è®°å¾—åŸå­ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŸ¥ `UnoCSS çš„åŸå­ç±»`ï¼Œ [UnoCSS Interactive](https://unocss.dev/interactive/)ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ ![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/4-4.CB7fDlZB.png)

ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹ `tailwindcss` çš„åŸå­ç±»ï¼Œæ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°æ˜äº†ï¼Œ [é“¾æ¥ \- tailwindcss](https://tailwindcss.com/)ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼š

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/4-5.BOO5kTV6.png)

## å¸¸ç”¨çš„åŸå­ç±» [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#%E5%B8%B8%E7%94%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%8E%9F%E5%AD%90%E7%B1%BB)

- å®½é«˜å†…å¤–è¾¹è·ï¼š `w-2`, `h-4`, `px-6`, `mt-8` ç­‰
- å‰æ™¯è‰²èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ï¼š `text-green-400`, `bg-green-500`
- border: `border-2`, `border-solid`, `border-green-600`, `b-r-2` (æ³¨æ„ `border` = `border-1`ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¯´è¾¹æ¡† `1px` æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬ç®€å†™ä¸º `border` )
- border-radius: `rounded-full`, `rounded-6`, `rounded-sm` (ä¸æ˜¯ `br-10`, ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯ `b-r-10`)
- line-height: `leading-10` (ä¸æ˜¯ `l-10`, ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯ `lh-10`)
- hover: `hover:text-green-200`, `hover:bg-green-300`, `hover:border-dashed`
- flex: `flex`, `items-center`, `justify-center`, `flex-1`

## `UnoCSS` é…ç½® [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#unocss-%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE)

ä¸‹é¢å†…å®¹é€‰è¯»ï¼š

Details

`unocss.config.ts` æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ts

```
// uno.config.ts
import {
  type Preset,
  defineConfig,
  presetUno,
  presetAttributify,
  presetIcons,
  transformerDirectives,
  transformerVariantGroup,
} from 'unocss'

import { presetApplet, presetRemRpx, transformerAttributify } from 'unocss-applet'

// @see https://unocss.dev/presets/legacy-compat
import { presetLegacyCompat } from '@unocss/preset-legacy-compat'

const isMp = process.env?.UNI_PLATFORM?.startsWith('mp') ?? false

const presets: Preset[] = []
if (isMp) {
  // ä½¿ç”¨å°ç¨‹åºé¢„è®¾
  presets.push(presetApplet(), presetRemRpx())
} else {
  presets.push(
    // éå°ç¨‹åºç”¨å®˜æ–¹é¢„è®¾
    presetUno(),
    // æ”¯æŒcss classå±æ€§åŒ–
    presetAttributify(),
  )
}
export default defineConfig({
  presets: [\
    ...presets,\
    // æ”¯æŒå›¾æ ‡ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ­é…å›¾æ ‡åº“ï¼Œeg: @iconify-json/carbon, ä½¿ç”¨ `<button class="i-carbon-sun dark:i-carbon-moon" />`\
    presetIcons({\
      scale: 1.2,\
      warn: true,\
      extraProperties: {\
        display: 'inline-block',\
        'vertical-align': 'middle',\
      },\
    }),\
    // å°†é¢œè‰²å‡½æ•° (rgb()å’Œhsl()) ä»ç©ºæ ¼åˆ†éš”è½¬æ¢ä¸ºé€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œæ›´å¥½çš„å…¼å®¹æ€§appç«¯ï¼Œexampleï¼š\
    // `rgb(255 0 0)` -> `rgb(255, 0, 0)`\
    // `rgba(255 0 0 / 0.5)` -> `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`\
    presetLegacyCompat({\
      commaStyleColorFunction: true,\
    }) as Preset,\
  ],
  /**
   * è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¿«æ·è¯­å¥
   * @see https://github.com/unocss/unocss#shortcuts
   */
  shortcuts: [['center', 'flex justify-center items-center']],
  transformers: [\
    // å¯ç”¨ @apply åŠŸèƒ½\
    transformerDirectives(),\
    // å¯ç”¨ () åˆ†ç»„åŠŸèƒ½\
    // æ”¯æŒcss classç»„åˆï¼Œeg: `<div class="hover:(bg-gray-400 font-medium) font-(light mono)">æµ‹è¯• unocss</div>`\
    transformerVariantGroup(),\
    // Don't change the following order\
    transformerAttributify({\
      // è§£å†³ä¸ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹æ¡†æ¶æ ·å¼å†²çªé—®é¢˜\
      prefixedOnly: true,\
      prefix: 'fg',\
    }),\
  ],
  rules: [\
    [\
      'p-safe',\
      {\
        padding:\
          'env(safe-area-inset-top) env(safe-area-inset-right) env(safe-area-inset-bottom) env(safe-area-inset-left)',\
      },\
    ],\
    ['pt-safe', { 'padding-top': 'env(safe-area-inset-top)' }],\
    ['pb-safe', { 'padding-bottom': 'env(safe-area-inset-bottom)' }],\
  ],
})

/**
 * æœ€ç»ˆè¿™ä¸€å¥—ç»„åˆä¸‹æ¥ä¼šå¾—åˆ°ï¼š
 * mp é‡Œé¢ï¼šmt-4 => margin-top: 32rpx  == 16px
 * h5 é‡Œé¢ï¼šmt-4 => margin-top: 1rem == 16px
 *
 * å¦å¤–ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜å¯ä»¥æ¨ç®—å‡º UnoCSS å•ä½ä¸è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å·®åˆ«4å€ã€‚
 * 375 * 4 = 1500ï¼ŒæŠŠè®¾è®¡ç¨¿è®¾ç½®ä¸º1500ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè®¾è®¡ç¨¿é‡Œå¤šå°‘pxï¼Œunocsså°±å†™å¤šå°‘è¿°èŒã€‚
 * ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼Œè®¾è®¡ç¨¿æ˜¾ç¤ºæŸå…ƒç´ å®½åº¦100pxï¼Œå°±å†™w-100å³å¯ã€‚
 *
 * å¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹å¼å†™æ ·å¼ï¼Œåˆ™æ¨èè®¾è®¡ç¨¿è®¾ç½®ä¸º 750ï¼Œè¿™æ ·è®¾è®¡ç¨¿1pxï¼Œä»£ç å†™1rpxã€‚
 * rpxæ˜¯å“åº”å¼çš„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®©ä¸åŒè®¾å¤‡çš„å±å¹•æ˜¾ç¤ºæ•ˆæœä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ã€‚
 */
```

### UnoCSS presets [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#unocss-presets)

ä¸»è¦æœ‰ `4` ä¸ªï¼š

- `presetUno` â€”â€” `UnoCSS` é»˜è®¤çš„é¢„è®¾ï¼Œ `H5ç«¯` é€‚ç”¨ï¼Œ `éH5ç«¯` ä¸æ”¯æŒï¼Œä»£ç å·²ç»ä½œåŒºåˆ«å¤„ç†ã€‚
- `presetApplet` å°ç¨‹åºé¢„è®¾ï¼Œå› ä¸ºé»˜è®¤ `Unocss é¢„è®¾` æ˜¯é’ˆå¯¹ `WEB` çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸åŠ ä»¥å¤„ç†ï¼Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å°ç¨‹åºä¸æ”¯æŒ `*`ï¼Œ æ²¡æœ‰ `body` ç­‰ã€‚è¯¥é¢„è®¾åŒæ ·å¯¹ `APP` ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚
- `presetIcons`ï¼Œä¸“é—¨ä½¿ç”¨ `UnoCSS Icons` çš„ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ­é…å›¾æ ‡åº“ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œeg: `@iconify-json/carbon`, ä»£ç ç¼–å†™å¦‚ `<button class="i-carbon-sun dark:i-carbon-moon" />`
- `presetLegacyCompat` é’ˆå¯¹ä½ç«¯ `APP` ä¸è®¤è¯†æ–°çš„å‡½æ•°é¢œè‰²çš„å…¼å®¹æ€§é¢„è®¾ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†é¢œè‰²å‡½æ•° `rgb()å’Œhsl()` é‡Œé¢ç©ºæ ¼åˆ†éš”è½¬æ¢ä¸ºé€—å·åˆ†éš”ï¼Œæ›´å¥½çš„å…¼å®¹æ€§ `APP` ç«¯ï¼Œexampleï¼š

> `rgb(255 0 0)` -\> `rgb(255, 0, 0)`
>
> `rgba(255 0 0 / 0.5)` -\> `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`


### UnoCSS shortcuts [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#unocss-shortcuts)

ts

```
/**
* è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¿«æ·è¯­å¥
* @see https://github.com/unocss/unocss#shortcuts
*/
shortcuts: [['center', 'flex justify-center items-center']],
```

å¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™ä¸€äº›å¸¸ç”¨çš„å¿«æ·ç±»åï¼Œå¦‚ä¸Šè¡¨ç¤º `center` å°±æ˜¯ `flex justify-center items-center` çš„ç»„åˆï¼Œåˆç†çš„æ·»åŠ å¿«æ·ç±»åå¯ä»¥åŠ å¿«æ ·å¼ç¼–å†™ã€‚

## è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å°ºå¯¸ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#%E8%AE%BE%E8%AE%A1%E7%A8%BF%E5%B0%BA%E5%AF%B8)

ä¸åŒçš„ç¼–å†™æ–¹å¼ï¼Œéœ€è¦è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å°ºå¯¸ï¼Œè¯·çœ‹ä¸‹æ–‡ï¼š

### 1\. ä¼ ç»Ÿç¼–å†™æ–¹å¼ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#_1-%E4%BC%A0%E7%BB%9F%E7%BC%96%E5%86%99%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F)

å¦‚æœæœ‰è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ä½¿ç”¨ä¼ ç»Ÿçš„ç¼–å†™ `CSS` çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé‡Œé¢çš„å¯¹åº”å°ºå¯¸è§„å¾‹å¦‚ä¸‹ã€‚ä»¥è“æ¹–ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œå‡å¦‚è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å®½åº¦ä¸º `750px`ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶æ ·å¼ä»£ç åˆ° css ä»£ç ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æŠŠ `px` æ‰¹é‡æ›¿æ¢ä¸º `rpx` å³å¯ã€‚

å¦‚æœè®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸æ˜¯ `750px` å¯ä»¥è°ƒæ•´è“æ¹–çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼Œè®©è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å®½åº¦ä¸º `750px`ã€‚

> ä¸‹é¢ä¸ºä¸€æ®µè¾…åŠ©è¯´æ˜æ–‡æ¡ˆï¼Œä» `uniapp` å®˜ç½‘æ¬è¿è€Œæ¥ã€‚

`rpx` æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºåŸºå‡†å®½åº¦çš„å•ä½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å±å¹•å®½åº¦è¿›è¡Œè‡ªé€‚åº”ã€‚ `uni-app` è§„å®šå±å¹•åŸºå‡†å®½åº¦ `750rpx`ã€‚

å¼€å‘è€…å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è®¾è®¡ç¨¿åŸºå‡†å®½åº¦è®¡ç®—é¡µé¢å…ƒç´  `rpx` å€¼ï¼Œè®¾è®¡ç¨¿ `1px` ä¸æ¡†æ¶æ ·å¼ `1rpx` è½¬æ¢å…¬å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

`è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ 1px / è®¾è®¡ç¨¿åŸºå‡†å®½åº¦ = æ¡†æ¶æ ·å¼ 1rpx / 750rpx`

æ¢è¨€ä¹‹ï¼Œé¡µé¢å…ƒç´ å®½åº¦åœ¨ `uni-app` ä¸­çš„å®½åº¦è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼ï¼š

`750 * å…ƒç´ åœ¨è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸­çš„å®½åº¦ / è®¾è®¡ç¨¿åŸºå‡†å®½åº¦`

ä¸¾ä¾‹è¯´æ˜ï¼š

è‹¥è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å®½åº¦ä¸º `750px`ï¼Œå…ƒç´  `A` åœ¨è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸Šçš„å®½åº¦ä¸º `100px`ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå…ƒç´  `A` åœ¨ `uni-app` é‡Œé¢çš„å®½åº¦åº”è¯¥è®¾ä¸ºï¼š `750 * 100 / 750`ï¼Œç»“æœä¸ºï¼š `100rpx`ã€‚

è‹¥è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å®½åº¦ä¸º `640px`ï¼Œå…ƒç´  `A` åœ¨è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸Šçš„å®½åº¦ä¸º `100px`ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå…ƒç´  `A` åœ¨ `uni-app` é‡Œé¢çš„å®½åº¦åº”è¯¥è®¾ä¸ºï¼š `750 * 100 / 640`ï¼Œç»“æœä¸ºï¼š `117rpx`ã€‚

è‹¥è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å®½åº¦ä¸º `375px`ï¼Œå…ƒç´  `B` åœ¨è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸Šçš„å®½åº¦ä¸º `200px`ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå…ƒç´  `B` åœ¨ `uni-app` é‡Œé¢çš„å®½åº¦åº”è¯¥è®¾ä¸ºï¼š `750 * 200 / 375`ï¼Œç»“æœä¸ºï¼š `400rpx`ã€‚

### 2\. UnoCSS ç¼–å†™æ–¹å¼ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#_2-unocss-%E7%BC%96%E5%86%99%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F)

ç»è¿‡ä¸Šä¸€èŠ‚çš„ `unocss.config.ts` é…ç½®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ä¸‹é¢çš„ç»„åˆï¼š

> mp é‡Œé¢ï¼šmt-4 => margin-top: 32rpx == 16px
>
> h5 é‡Œé¢ï¼šmt-4 => margin-top: 1rem == 16px

æˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜æ˜¯æŠŠè®¾è®¡ç¨¿è®¾ç½®ä¸º `750`ï¼Œè®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸Šå¤šå°‘ `px` çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå†™æˆå¤šå°‘ `rpx` å³å¯ã€‚

å…ƒç´  `A` åœ¨è®¾è®¡ç¨¿ä¸Šçš„å®½åº¦ä¸º `100px`ï¼Œåˆ™å†™ `w-100rpx` å³å¯ã€‚

å°±æ˜¯æŠŠ `ä¼ ç»Ÿç¼–å†™æ–¹å¼` ä¸­å†™åœ¨ `css` ä¸­çš„æ ·å¼æ¬åˆ°äº† `UnoCSS` ä¸­ã€‚

å¦‚æœè¦æƒ³ç”¨ `w-100` è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œéœ€è¦åšé¢å¤–çš„å¤„ç†ï¼ˆå¾…éªŒè¯ï¼‰ï¼š

Details

å¤ªå¿™äº†ï¼Œæœ‰ç©ºå†å†™å§ã€‚

## æ€»ç»“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/4-style\#%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%93)

æœ¬æ–‡ä¸»è¦ä»‹ç»äº† `UnoCSS` çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä»¥åŠ `unocss.config.ts` ä¸­çš„ä¸€äº›é…ç½®é¡¹ã€‚

åŒæ—¶è¯´æ˜äº†è®¾è®¡ç¨¿åœ¨ä¸¤ç§ç¼–å†™æ–¹å¼ä¸‹çš„å®½åº¦çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ä¸º `750` å’Œ `1500`.

æœ€åè¯´æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œ `åŸå­åŒ–CSS` å’Œ `ä¼ ç»Ÿæ–¹å¼` ä¸¤è€…ä¸æ˜¯äº’æ–¥çš„ï¼Œä»–ä»¬æ˜¯äº’è¡¥çš„ï¼Œåˆé€‚çš„åœ°æ–¹ä½¿ç”¨åˆé€‚çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

## UniBest FAQ
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq#VPContent)

# å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98)

æœ¬ç¯‡ä»‹ç»ä¸€äº›å¸¸è§çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä¼šæŒç»­æ›´æ–°ã€‚

## 1\. å¦‚ä½•è®¾ç½®/ä¿®æ”¹é¦–é¡µï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_1-%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE-%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9%E9%A6%96%E9%A1%B5)

`vue` æ–‡ä»¶çš„ `route-block` å—é‡Œé¢è®¾ç½® `type="home"` å³å¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿é¡¹ç›®é‡Œé¢ `åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢` æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®ã€‚

> æ³¨æ„ï¼šå¦‚æœæœ‰å¤šä¸ªï¼Œä¼šæŒ‰ç…§å­—æ¯é¡ºåºæ’åˆ—ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯é¦–é¡µã€‚ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½ä¸æ˜¯æ‚¨çš„æƒ³è¦çš„æ•ˆæœã€‚ï¼‰

## 2\. ä¿®æ”¹ `pages.json`ã€ `manifest.json` è¢«è¦†ç›–é—®é¢˜ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_2-%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9-pages-json%E3%80%81manifest-json-%E8%A2%AB%E8%A6%86%E7%9B%96%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98)

- `pages.json`

æœ¬é¡¹ç›®å¼•å…¥äº† `@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages`ï¼Œ `pages.json` æ–‡ä»¶å°†ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œæ‰‹åŠ¨ä¿®æ”¹ `pages.json` å°†ä¼šè¢«è¦†ç›–ã€‚

å…¨å±€çš„ä¸œè¥¿è¯·åœ¨ `pages.config.ts` é‡Œé¢é…ç½®ï¼Œé¡µé¢çš„ä¸œè¥¿è¯·åœ¨ `vue` æ–‡ä»¶çš„ `route-block` é…ç½®ã€‚

- `manifest.json`

ä¸ä¸Šé¢ç±»ä¼¼ã€‚æœ¬é¡¹ç›®å¼•å…¥äº† `@uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-manifest`ï¼Œ `manifest.json` æ–‡ä»¶å°†ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œæ‰‹åŠ¨ä¿®æ”¹ `manifest.json` å°†ä¼šè¢«è¦†ç›–ã€‚

å¦‚éœ€ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œè¯·åœ¨ `manifest.config.ts` é‡Œé¢ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

## 3\. æ€ä¹ˆåˆ†åŒ…ï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_3-%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E5%88%86%E5%8C%85)

`vite.config.ts` é‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé…ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š(å…¶ä¸­ `subPackages` å°±æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥åˆ†åŒ…çš„)

ts

```
UniPages({
    exclude: ['**/components/**/**.*'],
    subPackages: ['src/pages-sub'], // æ˜¯ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é…ç½®å¤šä¸ª
}),
```

## 4\. é¦–æ¬¡è¿è¡Œ `pnpm:mp` æ—¶æŠ¥é”™ã€‚ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_4-%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C-pnpm-mp-%E6%97%B6%E6%8A%A5%E9%94%99%E3%80%82)

é¦–æ¬¡è¿è¡Œ `pnpm:mp` æ—¶æŠ¥é”™ï¼ŒæŠ¥é”™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

text

```
Error: ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '/Users/burtlai/unibest-projects/unibest/src/manifest.json'
```

é¦–æ¬¡è¿è¡Œ `éh5ç«¯` æ—¶éƒ½å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°ä¸Šé¢çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œä¸€ä¸‹ `pnpm i` ä»¥ç”Ÿæˆ `src/manifest.json` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåé¢å°±ä¸ä¼šæŠ¥é”™äº†ã€‚

## 5\. `git commit` æŠ¥é”™ã€‚ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_5-git-commit-%E6%8A%A5%E9%94%99%E3%80%82)

è¯·çœ‹ `commitlint.config.ts` é‡Œé¢çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ»¡è¶³å¯¹åº”çš„è®¾å®šã€‚æ ¹æ®è‡ªå·±çš„éœ€è¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹ `commitlint.config.ts` é‡Œé¢çš„é…ç½®ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¡çš„ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚å¼•å…¥äº†æŸä¸ªç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åº“ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ `--no-verify` å‚æ•°è·³è¿‡æ ¡éªŒï¼š

sh

```

```

ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åº“è¿˜æœ‰å¦å¤–ä¸€ç§å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°ç‰¹å®šçš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨ `.eslintignore` å’Œ `.styleintignore` é‡Œé¢åŠ ä¸Šè¯¥æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ã€‚

## 6\. ä¸æƒ³è¦ä¸¥æ ¼çš„ `git` æäº¤æ£€æµ‹ï¼Œæ€ä¹ˆåŠï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_6-%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E8%A6%81%E4%B8%A5%E6%A0%BC%E7%9A%84-git-%E6%8F%90%E4%BA%A4%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B-%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E5%8A%9E)

ç›´æ¥æŠŠ `.husky` è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶åˆ æ‰å³å¯ã€‚(æˆ–è€…ä¸åˆ é™¤ï¼ŒåªæŠŠé‡Œé¢çš„æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹æ³¨é‡Šæ‰ã€‚)

## 7\. `uni-app` æ— æ³•ä½¿ç”¨ `process.env` å˜é‡ï¼Œæ€ä¹ˆåŠï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_7-uni-app-%E6%97%A0%E6%B3%95%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8-process-env-%E5%8F%98%E9%87%8F-%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E5%8A%9E)

> æ³¨æ„ï¼Œä¸Šé¢çš„å‘½ä»¤ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å®‰è£… `vue-i18n`ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ‰‹åŠ¨åˆ é™¤ï¼ˆ `pnpm un vue-i18n`)ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸ç†å®ƒï¼ˆæ²¡å¤šå¤§å½±å“ï¼‰ã€‚

## 9\. å¦‚ä½•æŠŠå·²ç»åŠ å…¥ `git` ç®¡ç†çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç§»å‡º `git` ç®¡ç†? [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_9-%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%8A%8A%E5%B7%B2%E7%BB%8F%E5%8A%A0%E5%85%A5-git-%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E7%9A%84%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6%E7%A7%BB%E5%87%BA-git-%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86)

- ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå…ˆæŠŠæ–‡ä»¶ç§»å‡º `git` ç®¡ç†ï¼Œæ“ä½œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

- ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼Œæäº¤ `commit` ä»¥æ­£å¼åˆ é™¤çš„æ–‡ä»¶

> æ€»ç»“ï¼š `git rm -r --cached .` \+ `git commit` å³å¯ã€‚

## 10\. æ”¯ä»˜å®å°ç¨‹åºè¿è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™ã€‚ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_10-%E6%94%AF%E4%BB%98%E5%AE%9D%E5%B0%8F%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E6%8A%A5%E9%94%99%E3%80%82)

## 11\. æ”¯æŒ `uni-app x` å—ï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_11-%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81-uni-app-x-%E5%90%97)

## 12\. ä¸ºå•¥ `package.json` ä¸­ `vue` å·²ç» `3.4+` äº†ï¼Œè¿˜ä¸æ”¯æŒ `defineModel` ? [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_12-%E4%B8%BA%E5%95%A5-package-json-%E4%B8%AD-vue-%E5%B7%B2%E7%BB%8F-3-4-%E4%BA%86-%E8%BF%98%E4%B8%8D%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81-definemodel)

çœŸå®è¿è¡ŒæŠ¥é”™æˆªå›¾å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šï¼ˆåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ `å°ç¨‹åº` å’Œ `APP`ï¼Œ éƒ½ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ ï¼‰

## 13\. `base` æ¨¡æ¿å¦‚ä½•æ¥ `uniCloud` ? [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/14-faq\#_13-base-%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%8E%A5-unicloud)

1. æ“ä½œæ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šç›´æ¥åœ¨åŸå§‹é¡¹ç›®ç›®å½•ä¸Šå³é”®ï¼Œé‡æ–°è¯†åˆ«é¡¹ç›®ç±»å‹ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å…³è” `uniCloud` äº†ï¼Œç„¶åç”¨åŸå§‹é¡¹ç›®ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å† `pnpm dev:app` åå¯¼å…¥ `dist/dev/app` å†è¿è¡Œäº†ã€‚

æœ‰ `15` äººï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸ä¸€ä¸€åˆ—å‡ºã€‚ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå¸Œæœ›å±•ç¤ºï¼Œè¯·è”ç³»æˆ‘ï¼‰

## çº¢åŒ…æ‰“èµ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/advanced/sponsor/sponsor\#%E7%BA%A2%E5%8C%85%E6%89%93%E8%B5%8F)

è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ç¾¤å‹æ˜¯å‘ `ä¸“å±çº¢åŒ…` æ‰“èµçš„ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œæ²¡æœ‰ç»Ÿè®¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦å±•ç¤ºï¼Œè¯·è”ç³»æˆ‘ã€‚

* * *

> å†æ¬¡æ„Ÿè°¢æ‰€æœ‰èµåŠ©è€…ã€æ‰“èµè€…ï¼

## UI Library Replacement Guide
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui#VPContent)

On this page

# UI åº“æ›¿æ¢ç¯‡ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui\#ui-%E5%BA%93%E6%9B%BF%E6%8D%A2%E7%AF%87)

## é»˜è®¤ UI åº“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui\#%E9%BB%98%E8%AE%A4-ui-%E5%BA%93)

`unibest` ç»è¿‡å‡ æ¬¡æ›´è¿­ï¼Œå…ˆåä½¿ç”¨ `uni-ui`ã€ `uv-ui` ä½œä¸ºé»˜è®¤ UI åº“ï¼Œç›®å‰ä½¿ç”¨ `wot-ui` ä¸ºé»˜è®¤ UI åº“ã€‚

`wot-ui` æ˜¯ `vue3+ts` ç¼–å†™çš„å…¨ç«¯æ”¯æŒçš„ UI åº“ï¼Œç¼–ç ä½“éªŒæ¯” `uv-ui` æ›´å¥½ï¼›è€Œå®˜æ–¹ç»´æŠ¤çš„ `uni-ui` åˆ™æ ·å¼ç•¥ä¸‘ï¼Œç»„ä»¶è¾ƒå°‘ï¼Œæ•…å¼ƒä¹‹ã€‚

> `wot-ui` å…¨ç§° `wot-design-uni`ï¼Œæ˜¯ `wot-design` çš„ `uniapp` ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæ–‡æ¡£åœ°å€ï¼š [https://wot-design-uni.netlify.app/](https://wot-design-uni.netlify.app/).

* * *

å¾ˆå¤šç¾¤å‹åé¦ˆæœ‰å…¶ä»– `UI` åº“çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ›´æ¢ `UI åº“` éœ€è¦å“ªäº›æ­¥éª¤å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

- å…ˆå¸è½½åŸæœ‰çš„ `wot-ui` åº“
- å†å®‰è£…å…¶ä»– `UI åº“`

ä¸‹é¢æˆ‘ä»¬ç®€å•æè¿°ä¸€ä¸‹æ›´æ¢ 2 ä¸ªä¸»æµ `UIåº“` â€”â€” `uni-ui` \+ `uv-ui` çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

> å½“ç„¶ä¹Ÿæ”¯æŒåŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨å¤šä¸ª `UI åº“`ï¼Œæœ‰ ES æ‘‡æ ‘ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œä¸å¿…æ‹…å¿ƒæ‰“åŒ…åçš„ä½“ç§¯ã€‚

## å¸è½½ wot-ui åº“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui\#%E5%8D%B8%E8%BD%BD-wot-ui-%E5%BA%93)

å¸è½½ `wot-ui` è¿‡ç¨‹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

1. åˆ é™¤ `wot-ui` åº“ï¼š

sh

```
  pnpm un wot-design-uni
```

2. `pages.config.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ `easycom.custom` åˆ é™¤ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
easycom: {
    autoscan: true,
    custom: {
-     '^wd-(.*)': 'wot-design-uni/components/wd-$1/wd-$1.vue',
    },
},
```

3. ` tsconfig.json` æ–‡ä»¶ `compilerOptions.types` åˆ é™¤ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
"types": [\
    "@dcloudio/types",\
    "@types/wechat-miniprogram",\
-   "wot-design-uni/global.d.ts",\
    "./components.d.ts",\
    "./global.d.ts"\
]
```

## å®‰è£… `uni-ui` åº“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui\#%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85-uni-ui-%E5%BA%93)

1. å®‰è£… `uni-ui` åº“ï¼š

sh

```
pnpm add @dcloudio/uni-ui
```

2. `pages.config.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ `easycom.custom` æ·»åŠ ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
easycom: {
  autoscan: true,
  custom: {
+   '^uni-(.*)': '@dcloudio/uni-ui/lib/uni-$1/uni-$1.vue',
  },
},
```

3. ` tsconfig.json` æ–‡ä»¶ `compilerOptions.types` æ·»åŠ ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
"types": [\
    "@dcloudio/types",\
    "@types/wechat-miniprogram",\
+   "@uni-helper/uni-ui-types",\
    "./components.d.ts",\
    "./global.d.ts"\
]
```

## å®‰è£… `uv-ui` åº“ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/7-ui\#%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85-uv-ui-%E5%BA%93)

1. å®‰è£… `uv-ui` åº“ï¼š

sh

```
pnpm add @climblee/uv-ui
```

2. `pages.config.ts` æ–‡ä»¶ `easycom.custom` æ·»åŠ ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
easycom: {
  autoscan: true,
  custom: {
+   '^uv-(.*)': '@climblee/uv-ui/components/uv-$1/uv-$1.vue',
  },
},
```

3. ` tsconfig.json` æ–‡ä»¶ `compilerOptions.types` æ·»åŠ ç›¸å…³é…ç½®ï¼š

diff

```
"types": [\
  "@dcloudio/types",\
  "@types/wechat-miniprogram",\
+ "@ttou/uv-typings/shim",\
+ "@ttou/uv-typings/v2",\
  "./components.d.ts",\
  "./global.d.ts"\
]
```

> å…¶ä»– UI åº“çš„å®‰è£…ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œä¸å†èµ˜è¿°ã€‚

å…¨æ–‡å®Œ~

## UniBest FAQ
[Skip to content](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq#VPContent)

On this page

# å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜ 2 [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98-2)

## 1\. `wot-ui` çš„ `toast` \+ `message-box` ä¸ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_1-wot-ui-%E7%9A%84-toast-message-box-%E4%B8%8D%E7%94%9F%E6%95%88%E3%80%82)

1. `layout` å¼•å…¥ `wot-ui` çš„ `toast` \+ `message-box`ã€‚

vue

```
<!-- src/layouts/default.vue -->
<template>
  <view>
    <slot />
    <wd-toast />
    <wd-message-box />
  </view>
</template>
```

> `unibest@2.1.0` å¼€å§‹å·²ç»é»˜è®¤å¼•å…¥ã€‚

- 2.é¡µé¢ä½¿ç”¨

ts

```
import { useMessage } from 'wot-design-uni'

const message = useMessage()
const handleClick = () => {
  // é¡ºä¾¿æµ‹è¯• message çš„ä½¿ç”¨
  message.show('æ˜¾ç¤ºéšè—åˆ‡æ¢')
}
```

## 2\. `uni-app` æ’ä»¶å¸‚åœºçš„æ’ä»¶å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_2-uni-app-%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E7%9A%84%E6%8F%92%E4%BB%B6%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8)

`hbx` æ¨¡æ¿å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å¼•å…¥ï¼Œä¸åœ¨è®¨è®ºèŒƒå›´å†…ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ `æ™®é€šæ¨¡æ¿`ã€‚

> å¦‚æœè¯¥æ’ä»¶æ”¯æŒ `npm` å®‰è£…ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å®‰è£…å³å¯ï¼Œæ¨èç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨ `pnpm` å®‰è£…ã€‚æ¥ç€æ ¹æ®è¯¥æ’ä»¶çš„æ–‡æ¡£ä½¿ç”¨å³å¯ã€‚

ä¸‹é¢æå†™çš„æ˜¯ä¸æ”¯æŒ `npm` å®‰è£…çš„æ’ä»¶ã€‚

è¿™é‡Œä»¥ `sp-editor` å¯Œæ–‡æœ¬æ’ä»¶ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œ [æ’ä»¶åœ°å€](https://ext.dcloud.net.cn/plugin?id=14726)

1. ä¸‹è½½ `uni-app` æ’ä»¶å¸‚åœºçš„ä»£ç ã€‚ï¼ˆå±…ç„¶è¦ç™»å½•+çœ‹å¹¿å‘Šï¼‰

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-1.CWBqx_nT.png)

2. è§£å‹å¹¶æ‹·è´åˆ° `unibest` é¡¹ç›®çš„ `uni_modules` ç›®å½•ä¸‹ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-2.DOmgZDOa.png)

3. æ•´ç†æ’ä»¶æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹åç§°ï¼ŒæŠŠ `sp-editor_1.3.7` æ”¹ä¸º `sp-editor`ã€‚

> ä¸æ”¹ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå†…éƒ¨ä»£ç éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨ `sp-editor` ä¸å¸¦ç‰ˆæœ¬å·çš„ã€‚ä¼šå¯¼è‡´æŸ¥æ‰¾æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-3.BPAQqWqR.png)

4. ä»£ç ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ— éœ€å¼•å…¥ç»„ä»¶ã€‚ï¼ˆ `uni-appæ’ä»¶` æœ‰ä¸€å¥—è§„èŒƒï¼Œ `uni-app` ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æŸ¥æ‰¾ï¼Œè·Ÿ `easycom` ç±»ä¼¼ã€‚ï¼‰

html

```
<template>
  <view class="home">
    <view class="editor-box">
      <sp-editor
        :toolbar-config="{
          excludeKeys: ['direction', 'date', 'lineHeight', 'letterSpacing', 'listCheck'],
          iconSize: '18px',
        }"
        @init="initEditor"
        @input="inputOver"
        @upinImage="upinImage"
        @overMax="overMax"
        @addLink="addLink"
        @exportHtml="exportHtml"
      ></sp-editor>
    </view>
  </view>
</template>
```

å®Œæ•´ç‰ˆè§ä¸‹ï¼š

Details

vue

```
<route lang="json5">
{
  layout: 'demo',
  style: { navigationBarTitleText: 'å¯Œæ–‡æœ¬' },
}
</route>

<template>
  <view class="home">
    <view class="editor-box">
      <sp-editor
        :toolbar-config="{
          excludeKeys: ['direction', 'date', 'lineHeight', 'letterSpacing', 'listCheck'],
          iconSize: '18px',
        }"
        @init="initEditor"
        @input="inputOver"
        @upinImage="upinImage"
        @overMax="overMax"
        @addLink="addLink"
        @exportHtml="exportHtml"
      ></sp-editor>
    </view>
  </view>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'

const editorIns = ref(null)

/**
 * è·å–è¾“å…¥å†…å®¹
 * @param {Object} e {html,text} å†…å®¹çš„htmlæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œå’Œtextæ–‡æœ¬
 */
function inputOver(e) {
  // å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è·å–åˆ°ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å·²ç¼–è¾‘çš„å†…å®¹
  console.log('==== inputOver :', e)
}

/**
 * è¶…å‡ºæœ€å¤§å†…å®¹é™åˆ¶
 * @param {Object} e {html,text} å†…å®¹çš„htmlæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œå’Œtextæ–‡æœ¬
 */
function overMax(e) {
  // è‹¥è®¾ç½®äº†æœ€å¤§å­—æ•°é™åˆ¶ï¼Œå¯åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è§¦å‘è¶…å‡ºé™åˆ¶çš„å›è°ƒ
  console.log('==== overMax :', e)
}

/**
 * ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å°±ç»ª
 * @param {Object} editor ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å®ä¾‹ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰è°ƒç”¨editorå®ä¾‹çš„æ–¹æ³•
 * @tutorial editorç»„ä»¶ https://uniapp.dcloud.net.cn/component/editor.html#editor-%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6
 * @tutorial ç›¸å…³api https://uniapp.dcloud.net.cn/api/media/editor-context.html
 */
function initEditor(editor) {
  editorIns.value = editor // ä¿å­˜ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å®ä¾‹
  // ä¿å­˜ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å®ä¾‹åï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è·å–åç«¯æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¹¶èµ‹å€¼ç»™ç¼–è¾‘å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å†…å®¹
  preRender()
}

function preRender() {
  setTimeout(() => {
    // å¼‚æ­¥è·å–åç«¯æ•°æ®åï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–ç¼–è¾‘å™¨å†…å®¹
    editorIns.value.setContents({
      html: `<div>&nbsp;&nbsp;çŒ«çŒ«<img src="https://img.yzcdn.cn/vant/cat.jpeg"/></div>`,
    })
  }, 1000)
}

/**
 * ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œç¤ºä¾‹å·¥ç¨‹æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡æ— æ³•æ­£å¸¸æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ
 * å› ä¸ºæ’ä»¶é»˜è®¤é‡‡ç”¨äº‘ç«¯å­˜å‚¨å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ–¹å¼
 * ä»¥$emit('upinImage', tempFiles, this.editorCtx)çš„æ–¹å¼å›è°ƒ
 * @param {Object} tempFiles
 * @param {Object} editorCtx
 */
function upinImage(tempFiles, editorCtx) {
  /**
   * æœ¬åœ°ä¸´æ—¶æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆ
   * æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œä»…æ˜¯ç¤ºä¾‹æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆï¼Œå› ä¸ºéœ€è¦å°†å›¾ç‰‡å…ˆä¸Šä¼ åˆ°äº‘ç«¯ï¼Œå†å°†å›¾ç‰‡æ’å…¥åˆ°ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ä¸­
   * æ­£å¼å¼€å‘æ—¶ï¼Œè¿˜è¯·å°†æ­¤å¤„æ³¨é‡Šï¼Œå¹¶è§£å¼€ä¸‹é¢ ä½¿ç”¨ uniCloud.uploadFile ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡çš„ç¤ºä¾‹æ–¹æ³• çš„æ³¨é‡Š
   * @tutorial https://uniapp.dcloud.net.cn/api/media/editor-context.html#editorcontext-insertimage
   */
  // #ifdef MP-WEIXIN
  // æ³¨æ„å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºçš„å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„æ˜¯åœ¨tempFilePathå­—æ®µä¸­
  editorCtx.insertImage({
    src: tempFiles[0].tempFilePath,
    width: '80%', // é»˜è®¤ä¸å»ºè®®é“ºæ»¡å®½åº¦100%ï¼Œé¢„ç•™ä¸€ç‚¹ç©ºéš™ä»¥ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·ç¼–è¾‘
    success: function () {},
  })
  // #endif

  // #ifndef MP-WEIXIN
  editorCtx.insertImage({
    src: tempFiles[0].path,
    width: '80%', // é»˜è®¤ä¸å»ºè®®é“ºæ»¡å®½åº¦100%ï¼Œé¢„ç•™ä¸€ç‚¹ç©ºéš™ä»¥ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·ç¼–è¾‘
    success: function () {},
  })
  // #endif

  /**
   * ä½¿ç”¨ uniCloud.uploadFile ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡çš„ç¤ºä¾‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå¯é€‚ç”¨å¤šé€‰ä¸Šä¼ ï¼‰
   * æ­£å¼å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ï¼Œè¯·å°†ä¸Šé¢ æœ¬åœ°ä¸´æ—¶æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆ æ³¨é‡Šåï¼Œæ¨¡ä»¿ä»¥ä¸‹å†™æ³•
   */
  // tempFiles.forEach(async (item) => {
  //   uni.showLoading({
  //     title: 'ä¸Šä¼ ä¸­è¯·ç¨å',
  //     mask: true
  //   })
  //   let upfile = await uniCloud.uploadFile({
  //     filePath: item.path,
  //     // åŒåä¼šå¯¼è‡´æŠ¥é”™ policy_does_not_allow_file_overwrite
  //     // cloudPathå¯ç”± æƒ³è¦å­˜å‚¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹/æ–‡ä»¶å æ‹¼æ¥ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸æ‹¼æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ååˆ™é»˜è®¤å­˜å‚¨åœ¨cloudstorageæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­
  //     cloudPath: `cloudstorage/${item.name}`,
  //     cloudPathAsRealPath: true
  //   })
  //   editorCtx.insertImage({
  //     src: upfile.fileID,
  //     width: '80%', // é»˜è®¤ä¸å»ºè®®é“ºæ»¡å®½åº¦100%ï¼Œé¢„ç•™ä¸€ç‚¹ç©ºéš™ä»¥ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·ç¼–è¾‘
  //     success: function () {
  //       uni.hideLoading()
  //     }
  //   })
  // })
}

/**
 * å¯¼å‡º - toolbaréœ€è¦å¼€å¯exportå·¥å…·
 * @param {string} e å¯¼å‡ºçš„htmlå†…å®¹
 */
function exportHtml(e) {
  uni.navigateTo({
    url: '/pages/out/out',
    success(res) {
      // ä¼ è‡³å¯¼å‡ºé¡µé¢è§£æå³å¯
      res.eventChannel.emit('e-transmit-html', {
        data: e,
      })
    },
  })
}

/**
 * æ·»åŠ è¶…é“¾æ¥
 * @param {Object} e { text: 'é“¾æ¥æè¿°', href: 'é“¾æ¥åœ°å€' }
 */
function addLink(e) {
  console.log('==== addLink :', e)
}
</script>
```

## 3\. Vue - Official ä½¿ç”¨å“ªä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_3-vue-official-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%93%AA%E4%B8%AA%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC)

~~ä½¿ç”¨ `1.8x`ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ `2.x`~~ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å‡ºç°ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼š

> æœ€æ–°çš„ `v2.1.10` å·²ç»å¯ä»¥äº†ï¼Œç›´æ¥å®‰è£…å³å¯.

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-4.z9-qF3ov.png)

## 4\. ä¸ºå•¥ä¸ç”¨ `vant-ui`ï¼Ÿ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_4-%E4%B8%BA%E5%95%A5%E4%B8%8D%E7%94%A8-vant-ui)

`vant-ui` æ˜¯ `WEB` ç«¯ `UI åº“`ï¼Œä¸é€‚ç”¨äº `uni-app`ã€‚

`uni-app` æ²¡æœ‰ `window`, `document` ç­‰ `WEB API`ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å‡¡æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨ `WEB API` çš„ `æ¡†æ¶`ã€ `UI åº“` ç­‰éƒ½ä¸é€‚ç”¨äº `uni-app`ã€‚

## 4\. æ§åˆ¶å°æŠ¥é”™ `[plugin:uni:mp-using-component] Unexpected token S in JSON at position 208`ã€‚ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_4-%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%B0%E6%8A%A5%E9%94%99-plugin-uni-mp-using-component-unexpected-token-s-in-json-at-position-208%E3%80%82)

æ§åˆ¶å°æŠ¥é”™å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š ![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-6.DMGXJ6lD.png)

åŸå› æ˜¯ `uni-pages` è¿™ä¸ªæ’ä»¶æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ `0.2.22` æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦å›é€€åˆ° `0.2.20`ã€‚

![alt text](https://www.unibest.tech/assets/15-5.DlxGQflG.png)

æ‰§è¡Œå¦‚ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤å³å¯ï¼š

```
pnpm add @uni-helper/vite-plugin-uni-pages@0.2.20
```

> å› ä¸º `unibest` åœ¨ `2.3.0ï¼ˆå«ï¼‰` ä¹‹å‰æ²¡æœ‰æŠŠ `pnpm-lock.yaml` åŠ å…¥åˆ°ç‰ˆæœ¬ç®¡ç†ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´å°ç‰ˆè¿˜æ˜¯æœ‰ç»†å¾®å·®åˆ«ã€‚
>
> åœ¨ `2.4.0` å¼€å§‹å·²ç»åŠ å…¥ï¼Œä¸ä¼šå†å‡ºç°è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ã€‚

## 5.ä¸ä¼š TypeScript æ€ä¹ˆåŠ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_5-%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A-typescript-%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E5%8A%9E)

ä¸ç®¡ä¸ªäººè¿˜æ˜¯å›¢é˜Ÿã€äº§å“æˆ–è€…é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œä»é•¿è¿œè€ƒè™‘æˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½å»ºè®®ä½ å­¦ä¹  TypeScriptï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒæ˜¯æœªæ¥çš„è¶‹åŠ¿ï¼Œè€Œä¸”å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æ¡†æ¶ã€åº“ã€æ’ä»¶éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨ TypeScript å¼€å‘çš„ï¼Œè¶³ä»¥è¯æ˜å®ƒæ˜¯æ„å»ºä¸€æ¬¾æˆç†Ÿç¨³å¥äº§å“çš„åŸºçŸ³ã€‚

ä½†è€ƒè™‘åˆ°å®é™…æƒ…å†µï¼Œä¼šå„ç§å®¢è§‚åŸå› å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¿…é¡»è¦ç”¨ä¼ ç»Ÿ JavaScript è¿›è¡Œå¼€å‘ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ `tsconfig.json` é‡Œå°† `allowJs` è®¾ç½®ä¸º `true` å³å¯ï¼Œæ¡†æ¶åŸæœ‰çš„ TypeScript ä»£ç ä¸ä¼šå—åˆ°å½±å“ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ JavaScript ç¼–å†™ä»£ç ã€‚

## 6.å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åº `INVALID_LOGIN` [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/15-faq\#_6-%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E5%B0%8F%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%8F-invalid-login)

å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºå¼€å‘è¿›å…¥ç™»å½•é¡µæ—¶ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´å¦‚ä¸‹é—®é¢˜ï¼š

text

```
{errMsg: "navigateTo:fail Error: INVALID_LOGIN,
access_token expired [20250103 17:08:03][touristappid]"}
```

> è§£ç­”ï¼šæ¸¸å®¢æ¨¡å¼ä¼šå‡ºç°è¯¥é”™è¯¯ï¼Œå¾®ä¿¡æ‰«ç ç™»å½•ä¸€ä¸‹å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

# å¾®ä¿¡äº¤æµç¾¤ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/advanced/wechat/wechat\#%E5%BE%AE%E4%BF%A1%E4%BA%A4%E6%B5%81%E7%BE%A4)

> ä½œè€…æœ€è¿‘æ¯”è¾ƒå¿™ï¼Œæœ¬æ¥æƒ³éšè—äº¤æµç¾¤çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿˜æ˜¯æœ‰äººé€šè¿‡åŠ æˆ‘å¾®ä¿¡ï¼Œè¦å»äº¤æµç¾¤ï¼Œç´¢æ€§è¿˜æ˜¯æ”¾å¼€å§ã€‚

æœ€è¿‘ä½œè€…å·¥ä½œå¾ˆå¿™ï¼Œæ²¡ç©ºçœ‹ç¾¤ï¼Œå¤§å®¶è‡ªè¡Œäº¤æµï¼Œæœ›è§è°…ã€‚

> å…¬å¸é»˜è®¤æ˜¯å¤§å°å‘¨çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å‰ç«¯ç»„æ¯”è¾ƒå¿™ï¼ŒåŸºæœ¬ä¸Šæ˜¯ `9106`ï¼Œæˆ‘æ‰€åœ¨çš„é¡¹ç›®åˆé¢å¤–å¿™ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ `9107` è¯ç”Ÿäº†ã€‚ç­‰è¿™ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®åšå®Œï¼ˆåˆ°æ˜å¹´3æœˆä»½å·¦å³ï¼‰çœ‹èƒ½ä¸èƒ½å¥½è½¬å§ã€‚

å†æ¬¡æé†’ï¼Œåƒä¸‡è®°å¾— `å…ˆçœ‹ä¸€éæ–‡æ¡£`ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è§£å†³å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†åŸºç¡€ç–‘é—®ã€‚

> æœ‰ç½‘å‹æµ‹é‡è¿‡ï¼Œè¯´è¦çœ‹ `å››ä¸ªå°æ—¶`ï¼Œå“ˆå“ˆã€‚

![alt text](https://oss.laf.run/ukw0y1-site/unibest-discussion-group/wechat.jpeg)

> å¦‚æœä¸Šé¢çš„å¾®ä¿¡ç¾¤æ»¡äº†ï¼Œè¯·ä½¿ç”¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ QQ ç¾¤ï¼ŒQQ ç¾¤ä¸ä¼šè¿‡æœŸï¼Œé•¿æœŸæœ‰æ•ˆã€‚

â‘ â‘¡ ç¾¤å·²æ»¡ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ â‘¢ ç¾¤ã€‚ ![alt text](https://oss.laf.run/ukw0y1-site/unibest-discussion-group/qq.jpeg)

æ–°é¡¹ç›®ä½¿ç”¨ `base` æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œå¯é€‰ `tabbar` æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚å¦‚æœéœ€è¦å¤šè¯­è¨€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€‰ `i18n` æ¨¡æ¿ã€‚

åŒæ—¶å‚è€ƒ `demo` æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ `clone` `demo` é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œç”¨æ¥å‚è€ƒç”¨ã€‚

# ç®€ä»‹ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/1-introduction\#%E7%AE%80%E4%BB%8B)

[![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/codercup/unibest?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/codercup/unibest)[![GitHub Repo stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/feige996/unibest?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/feige996/unibest)[![star](https://gitee.com/codercup/unibest/badge/star.svg?theme=dark)](https://gitee.com/codercup/unibest)![node version](https://img.shields.io/badge/node-%3E%3D18-green)![pnpm version](https://img.shields.io/badge/pnpm-%3E%3D7.30-green)![GitHub License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/codercup/unibest)

> ä¸Šé¢å‰ 2 ä¸ª `star` åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯æ—§ä»“åº“ `codercup` å’Œæ–°ä»“åº“ `feige996` çš„ `star` æ•°ã€‚

`unibest` æ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ `uniapp` å¼€å‘æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œç”± `uniapp` \+ `Vue3` \+ `Ts` \+ `Vite5` \+ `UnoCss` \+ `VSCode`(å¯é€‰ `webstorm`) \+ `uniæ’ä»¶` \+ `wot-ui`ï¼ˆå¯é€‰å…¶ä»– UI åº“ï¼‰æ„å»ºï¼Œé›†æˆäº†å¤šç§å·¥å…·å’ŒæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨äº†æœ€æ–°çš„å‰ç«¯æŠ€æœ¯æ ˆï¼Œæ— éœ€ä¾é  `HBuilderX`ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å‘½ä»¤è¡Œæ–¹å¼å³å¯è¿è¡Œ `web`ã€ `å°ç¨‹åº` å’Œ `App`ã€‚ï¼ˆæ³¨ï¼š `App` è¿˜æ˜¯éœ€è¦ `HBuilderX`ï¼‰

`unibest` å†…ç½®äº† `çº¦å®šå¼è·¯ç”±`ã€ `layoutå¸ƒå±€`ã€ `è¯·æ±‚å°è£…`ã€ `è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆª`ã€ `ç™»å½•æ‹¦æˆª`ã€ `UnoCSS`ã€ `i18nå¤šè¯­è¨€` ç­‰åŸºç¡€åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæä¾›äº† `ä»£ç æç¤º`ã€ `è‡ªåŠ¨æ ¼å¼åŒ–`ã€ `ç»Ÿä¸€é…ç½®`ã€ `ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µ` ç­‰è¾…åŠ©åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œè®©ä½ ç¼–å†™ `uniapp` æ‹¥æœ‰ `best` ä½“éªŒ ï¼ˆ `unibest çš„ç”±æ¥`ï¼‰ã€‚

> `unibest` ç›®å‰æ”¯æŒ `H5`ã€ `å°ç¨‹åº` å’Œ `App`ã€‚

â­â­â­â­â­

å¦‚æœ `unibest` å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›ä½ å¯ä»¥å» **Github** æˆ–è€… **Gitee(ç äº‘)** å¸®æˆ‘ç‚¹ä¸ª â­ ï¼Œè¿™å°†æ˜¯å¯¹æˆ‘æå¤§çš„é¼“åŠ±ã€‚

ä¸åŒç±»å‹æ¨¡æ¿å¯¹æ¯”ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾ï¼Œçº¢è‰²çš„ä¸º `unibest`ï¼Œåæ¥å±…ä¸Šï¼Œé¥é¥é¢†å…ˆã€‚

ç²‰è‰²çš„æ–°çš„ä»“åº“ï¼ˆ `feige996`ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ç›®å‰ç»´æŠ¤çš„ï¼Œæ—§çš„ `codercup` è¿›ä¸å»äº†ï¼Œ `deprecated` çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä¸å†ç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

## ğŸ—‚ ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/1-introduction\#%F0%9F%97%82-%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E8%BF%87%E7%A8%8B)

`unibest` ç”±æœ€åˆå§‹çš„å®˜æ–¹ cli è„šæ‰‹æ¶æ¨¡æ¿ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œçš„å‘½ä»¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

sh

```
npx degit dcloudio/uni-preset-vue#vite-ts my-vue3-project
```

`uniapp` å®˜æ–¹é“¾æ¥ï¼š [ç‚¹å‡»è·³è½¬ \- quickstart-cli](https://uniapp.dcloud.net.cn/quickstart-cli.html)

åœ¨å®˜æ–¹ç”Ÿæˆçš„é¡¹ç›®åŸºç¡€ä¸Šï¼Œå¢åŠ äº†å¦‚ä¸‹å†…å®¹ï¼š

- å‰ç«¯åŸºç¡€é…ç½®å…­ä»¶å¥—

- pinia + pinia-plugin-persistedstate
- é€šç”¨åŠŸèƒ½
  - è¯·æ±‚å°è£…

## âœ¨ ç‰¹æ€§ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/1-introduction\#%E2%9C%A8-%E7%89%B9%E6%80%A7)

- âš¡ï¸ [Vue 3](https://github.com/vuejs/core), [Vite](https://github.com/vitejs/vite), [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/), [esbuild](https://github.com/evanw/esbuild) \- å°±æ˜¯å¿«ï¼

- ğŸ”¥ æœ€æ–°è¯­æ³• \- `<script lang="ts" setup>` è¯­æ³•

- ğŸ¨ [UnoCSS](https://unocss.dev/) \- é«˜æ€§èƒ½ä¸”æå…·çµæ´»æ€§çš„å³æ—¶åŸå­åŒ– CSS å¼•æ“

- ğŸ˜ƒ [UnoCSS Icons](https://unocss.dev/presets/icons) & [icones](https://icones.js.org/) \- æµ·é‡å›¾æ ‡ä¾›ä½ é€‰æ‹©

- ğŸ [pinia](https://pinia.vuejs.org/) & [pinia-plugin-persistedstate](https://prazdevs.github.io/pinia-plugin-persistedstate/zh/guide/) \- å…¨ç«¯é€‚é…çš„å…¨å±€æ•°æ®ç®¡ç†

- ğŸ—‚ `uni.request` è¯·æ±‚å°è£… \- ä¸€é”®å¼•å…¥ï¼Œå¿«æ·ä½¿ç”¨

- ğŸ“¦ `è·¯ç”±æ‹¦æˆª` åŸºç¡€å°è£…ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæ‰©å±•ï¼Œå¿«æ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ‹’ç»é»‘ç›’

- ğŸ“¥ [API è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½](https://github.com/antfu/unplugin-auto-import) \- ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ Composition API æ— éœ€å¼•å…¥

- ğŸ‰ `v3` Code Snippets åŠ å¿«ä½ çš„é¡µé¢ç”Ÿæˆ

- ğŸ¦¾ `Pritter` & `ESLint` & `Stylelint` & `husky` & `lint-staged` \+ `commitlint` \- ä¿è¯ä»£ç è´¨é‡

- ğŸŒˆ `TypeScript` åŠ æŒï¼ŒåŒæ—¶åˆå…¼å®¹ `js` ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ»¡è¶³ä¸åŒäººç¾¤

- ğŸ’¡ `ES6 import` è‡ªåŠ¨æ’åºï¼Œ `css å±æ€§` è‡ªåŠ¨æ’åºï¼Œå¢å¼ºç¼–ç ä¸€è‡´æ€§

- ğŸ–¥ `å¤šç¯å¢ƒ` é…ç½®åˆ†å¼€ï¼Œæƒ³åˆ™æ€ä¹ˆé…ç½®å°±æ€ä¹ˆé…ç½®


## ğŸ“¦ ç›®å½•ç»“æ„ [â€‹](https://www.unibest.tech/base/1-introduction\#%F0%9F%93%A6-%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84)

é€šè¿‡ `tree -I node_modules -I dist -I .git -a > tree.md` å‘½ä»¤ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

txt

```
.
â”œâ”€â”€ .editorconfig
â”œâ”€â”€ .eslintignore
â”œâ”€â”€ .eslintrc-auto-import.json
â”œâ”€â”€ .eslintrc.cjs
â”œâ”€â”€ .gitignore
â”œâ”€â”€ .husky
â”œâ”€â”€ .npmrc
â”œâ”€â”€ .prettierignore
â”œâ”€â”€ .prettierrc.cjs
â”œâ”€â”€ .stylelintignore
â”œâ”€â”€ .stylelintrc.cjs
â”œâ”€â”€ .vscode
â”œâ”€â”€ LICENSE
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md
â”œâ”€â”€ commitlint.config.cjs
â”œâ”€â”€ env
â”‚Â Â  â”œâ”€â”€ .env
â”‚Â Â  â”œâ”€â”€ .env.development
â”‚Â Â  â”œâ”€â”€ .env.production
â”‚Â Â  â””â”€â”€ .env.test
â”œâ”€â”€ favicon.ico
â”œâ”€â”€ index.html
â”œâ”€â”€ manifest.config.ts
â”œâ”€â”€ package.json
â”œâ”€â”€ pages.config.ts
â”œâ”€â”€ src
```
